stanzas.text:
One day I lost my way, but no one cared
I searched for happiness, but found despair
Then Jesus spoke to me, revealed to me my sin
“I’ll heal your broken heart if I may enter in”.

A broken heart I gave a worthless thing
An empty life was all that I could bring
Then Jesus filled my life with love divine
He healed my broken heart
And now I know he’s mine.

Have you been wondering why you’re alone?
Does God seem far away, you doubt his love
Now Christ is at the door
He sees a heart that’s torn
His blood was shed for you, to give you life a new.

Mwen te pèdi wout la, yo pat pran ka-m
Mwen te chèche la jwa, m’jwenn dezespwa
Jezi pale avè-m revele-m peche-m yo
Kè brize-w la va geri si ou kite-l antre.

Yon kè brize m’te bay pat vo anyen
Sèlman yon vi tou vid m’te kap pote
Jezi ranpli lavi-m ak amou pa-l
L’geri kè brize-m nan
E kounye a m’se pa-l.

Eske-w t’ape mande pouki sa-w sèl
Eske Bon Dye byen lwen, pa kwè nan moun
Kris nan pòt la kounye a, wè yon kè ajite
San-l te koule pou ou, pou-l ba ou yon lòt vi.

For so long I had searched 
for a peace that was real
 never finding contentment within
then Jesus came and a new life he gave 
now I’m longing I’m longing for him.

I‘m longing for you, 
Lord I’m longing for you 
Here’s my heart Lord, 
I’m longing for you
Fill my cup fill it up, 
make me over a new
Here’s my heart Lord, 
I ‘m longing for you

There’s a place in my heart
That this word can not fill 
only Jesus and his perfect will
 He’s been my friend 
since the spirit came in 
now I’m longing I’m longing for him

Pou lontan m’ap cheche, 
gen yon pe ki reyel 
Mpat janm gen kontantman nan vi mwen 
Alo Jezu vini 
te banm yon vi nouvo 
Kounya dezi’m se pou’m viv pou li

Seye map cheche’w 
wi nanm mwen dezirew
Gad ke’m seye jan mwen dezirew
Plen tas mwen konpletman
E renouvle’l chak jou
men ke’m seye se ou’m dezire

Gen yon plas nan ke mwen 
mond sa pap satisfe 
Selman Jesus volonte pafe’l
 li vin zanmi’m 
depi lespri nan mwen 
kounya dezim desire’l chak jou

He came down from heaven to save us
O what pain and shame
He suffered here
Mockingly they hailed him
On a cross thy nailed him
That is why his name is so dear.

Above every name is the name of Jesus
Above every name is the name of Jesus
Above every name is the name of Jesus
Every knee shall bow
Every tongue confess
That Jesus is Lord of all.

When in prayer I whisper it softly
At the throne of grace it is the key
Angels love to hear it
Hell and demons fear it
Name of power and victory.

Li te soti nan syèl vin sove-n
O ki gran doulè ke-l te pote
Anpil te moke li, e yo te klouwe li
Se sa-k fè nom li si dous.

Pi wo tout lòt nom se le nom de Jezi
Pi wo tout lòt nom se le nom de Jezi
Pi wo tout lòt nom se le nom de Jezi
Tout jenou flechi, tout lang konfese
Jezu-Kris se Senyè.

Lè-m kanpe devan twòn de gras li
Pou-m priye nan nom mèvèye sa
Zanj yo renmen tande-l
Satan kouri pou li
Nom-k plen ak pouvwa e viktwa.

Alive, alive, alive forevermore
My Jesus is alive, alive forevermore
Alive, alive, alive forevermore
My Jesus is alive.
Sing hallelujah, sing hallelujah
My Jesus is alive forever more
Sing hallelujah, sing hallelujah
My Jesus is alive.

Vivan, vivan, vivan pou tout tan
Bon Dye nou an vivan
Li vivan pou tout tan.
Chante alelouya, chante alelouya
Bon Dye nou an vivan pou tout tan
Chante alelouya, chante alelouya
Bon Dye nou an vivan pou tout tan.

O Lord I want to take this time to be thankful
For all you’ve done in my life
I lay down, awake, and go through my day
All these times
you’re simply there protecting me.

All these times you have worked in my favor
All these times you’ve interceded for me
All these times, you’re simply there
Taking care of me
Jesus, I want to take this time
To say thank you Lord.

Jezi m’ta renmen pran tan sa
Pou-m remèsye-w
Pou tout sa ou fè nan lavi mwen
M’al kouche, m’leve, e-m fè tout aktivite-m
Tout tan sa ou sèlman la w’ap pwoteje-m.

Tout tan sa w’ap aji an favè mwen
Tout tan sa w’ap entèsede pou mwen
Tout tan sa ou sèlman la
W’ap pran swen mwen
Jezi mwen vle pran tan sa
Pou-m di-w mèsi Senyè.

titles.ht: ALELOUYA DYE-M NAN SE REPONS LA

stanzas.text:
Alleluia, He’s an answering God
Alleluia, He’s an answering God
When I pray in Jesus name
And by faith the answer came
Alleluia, He’s an answering God.

Alelouya Dye-m nan se repons la (2x)
Lè-m priye nan nom Jezi
Li pa pran tan pou-l reponn
Alelouya Dye-m nan se repons la.

We’ve gathered here on holy ground
Angels hovering all around
Stand now before him
Oh magnify him
Alleluia to the Lamb.

Adoration and praises fill my soul
Alleluia I will bestow
I will sing to the Lord
Lifting my hands
Alleluia to the Lamb.

King of Kings and Lord of Lords
We come to you in one accord
Holy, holy, Lamb of glory
Alleluia to the Lamb.

Nou vin ansanm sou tè ki sen an
Ak zanj yo kap vole nan syèl la
Koube devan twòn li
Mayifye nom-l ki sen
Alelouya a lanyo.

Adorasyon ak louwanj ranpli nanm mwen
Alelouya mwen va ofri
M’ap chante pou Senyè-m nan
M’ap leve men-m, alelouya a lanyo.

Wa dè wa, Senyè dè senyè
Nou vin devan-w nan yon sèl akò
Sen, sen dè sen , anyo de glwa
Alelouya a lanyo.

Amazing grace shall always be my song of praise
For it was grace that bought my liberty
I do not know just how he came to love me so
He looked beyond my faults and saw my needs.

I shall forever lift my eyes to Calvary
To view the cross where Jesus died for me
How marvelous
The grace that bought my falling soul
He looked beyond my faults and saw my need.

If not for grace my soul would be a drifting ship
With no safe harbor from the angry waves
But calvary’s cross shines brightly
Through the darkest storm
And just in time his mercy rescues me.

Gras san mezi ape toujou chan louwanj mwen
S’akoz gras sa ke-m te jwenn libète
Mwen pa konnen pouki li si renmen-m konsa
Li pat gad fot mwen l’te wè bezwen-m yo.

M’ape toujou leve zye mwen sou bwa kalvè
Pou-m wè kwa kot sovè-m nan te mouri
Se mèvèye gras sa ki te sove nanm mwen
Li pat gad fot mwen l’te wè bezwen-m yo.

Aren’t you glad that Jesus remenberded you ?
Aren’t you glad that
Jesus brought you to the truth?
Brought you to the body of which he is the head
Brought you to the living
Out from among the dead.

Eske-w pa kontan vre Jezi sove-w
Eske-w pa kontan vre li ba-w la verite
Li mete ou nan kò li
Se li menm ki tèt ou
Li wete-w pami mò yo
L’mete-w pami vivan.

As the deer panteth for the water
So my soul longeth after Thee
You alone are my heart's desire
And I long to worship Thee.

You alone are my strength, my shield
To you alone may my spirit yield
You alone are my heart's desire
And I long to worship Thee.

You're my friend and You are my brother
Even though You are a king
I love You more than any other
So much more than anything.

Only you loved me so
So much I can’t understand
Only you are there in the darkest night
Even in the deepest sea you’re there
Your great love help me to hold on.

Tank’on sèf ki swaf dlo nan dezè
Se konsa nanm mwen bezwen ou
Ou menm sèl kè mwen dezire
Ou menm sèl pou-m adore.

Tout fòs mwen se nan ou l’soti
Lespri mwen, mwen remèt li nan men ou
Ou menm sèl kè mwen dezire
Ou menm sèl pou-m adore.

Mwen pito-w plis ke lò ou lajan
Ou menm sèl kab satisfè-m
Ou menm sèl ki vrè jwa mwen
E ou se prinèl zye mwen.

Ou se zanmi-m e frè mwen
Menm kant ke ou se Wa mwen
Mwen renmen-w plis ke tout lòt moun
E plis ke tout lòt bagay.

God sent his son they called him Jesus
He came to love, heal and forgive
He lived and died to buy my pardon
An empty grave is there to prove my savior lives

Because he lives I can face tomorrow
Because he lives all fear is gone
Because I know he holds the future
And life is worth the living just because He lives

Bon Dye voye pitit li rele Jezi
Ki te vini e padone
Li rachete nou e li mete nou lib
Kounye a la li ak papa-l
Ape tann nou.

Mwen konnen-l vivan
M’ap konte sou demen
Paske-l vivan
Enkyetid mwen yo ale
Paske m-konnen, o m-konnen
Li se sous lavi mwen
M’ap konte jou pou-l vin chèche-m
Paske-l vivan.

Mwen aksepte tout sa ki rive mwen
Paske sovè-m kap defann mwen
Jouden an mèt devan-m
Kè mwen pap boulvèse
Paske Jezi-m nan pa mouri
Men li vivan.

Sèl espwa mwen se sou li sèlman
Paske-l di mwen l’ap vin chèche-m
Eprèv nan lavi sa pap fè-m doute ditou
Bon Dye-m nan gran e li vivan
M’ape tann li.

Because of him
A world was made to wonder
How one so meek and lowly as our King
Could ever love us so and bare the sorrow
As he who walked that lonely road to calvary.

Because of him
My soul has known such glory
Because of him I have a chance to win
Life everlasting and reign with him forever
And if I make it, it will be because of him.

Because of Him
The Holy ghost was given
He gives us power to overcome each sin
Because of Jesus I now own this blessing
He guides me on and it is all because of him.

Akoz li menm
Nonm sa tap chèche konnen
Sovè si dou emab tankou Wa nou
Te kap renmen-n e pote tristès nou yo
Tankou Jezi ki te mache sou wout kalvè.

Se pou li menm
Nanm mwen te jwenn tout glwa sa
Akoz li menm mwen gen yon lòt chans pou-m viv
Vi etènèl e adore pou tout tan
E si-m rive tout sa te fèt akoz li menm.

Akoz li menm
Sentespri a te desannn
Ba nou pwisans pou-n venkè sou peche
Akoz li menm
Mwen gen benediksyon pa-m
L’ap kondwi mwen nan tout sa m’va fè
Akoz li menm.

Akoz li menm
Yon pèp si dou si emab
Yon jou va kanpe ak kè pi e pwòp
Ak pèp sa yo va wè pwisans Bon Dye
Le mond va wè grandè Wa nou.

Bless your name Lord
Bless your holy name
O I will stand in the sanctuary
And bless your name , o Lord
I lift my voice in praise
My hands to heaven raise
And bless your name
Your righteous name, o Lord.

Beni nom ou Senyè,beni sen nom ou
Ou se yon tou pwisan
Beni sen nom ou
Jis yo antre ladan-l pou kache kont loraj
Beni nom ou Senyè
Beni sen nom ou.

Moses led God’s children
Forty years he led them
Through the cold
And through the night
Tho they said, “let’s turn back”
Moses said, “keep going
Canaan land is just insight.”

There will be no sorrow
There in that tomorrow
We will be there by and by
Milk and honey flowing
That is where I’m going
Canaan land is just insight.

Though we walk through valleys
Though we climb high mountains
We can not give up the fight
We must be like Moses
We must keep on going
Canaan land is just in sight.

Moyiz mennen pèp la, karantan-l mennen yo
Nan tan frèt e nan tout nwit
Yo di ann retounen, Moyiz di an avan
Kanaan la devan nou.

La pap gen soufrans ankò
Nan matine sa kote-n prale pou tout tan
Lèt ak myèl ap koule, kote nou prale
Nan kanaan selès la

Ke-n mache nan vale, ke-n monte mòn byen wo
Nou pa dwe sispann batay
Nou dwe fè kou Moyiz, ann kriye an avan
Kanaan la devan nou.

Change me o God
From the creature that I am
Renew my mind by the washing of the word
Restore my soul to you
Don’t leave me as I am
Lord I want to change, to change.

Chanje-m Senyè de kreyati mwen ye a
Renouvle panse-m
Lave-m avèk pawòl ou
Restore nanm mwen
Pa kite-m janm ye a
Senyè m’vle chanje e chanje.

My life seemed in vain
‘til one wonderful day
When the clouds were darkest
The Lord came my way
He said: “Child, I sought you
for you’ve been astray”
With his hand he led me to his great highway.

Chosen in God for redemption’s plan
Chosen in him I’ll follow the lamb
Who loved me and saved me
And taught me to pray
And said I’ll go with you
To the end of the way.

Lavi m pa't anyen jouk yon mèvèye jou
Lè nyaj yo sanble tou nwa
Segnè vin sou wout mwen
Lò l di m: "M'ap chèche ou pou w mache avè m"

Bondye chwazi m pou plan redanmsyon l 
Li chwazi mwen, E m'ap swiz Ayo a
Li renmen m. Li sove m.
L'anseye m priye
Li di l'ap toujou avè m jis kan m fin fè wout la

Bondye di m se pitit li pa yon nouvèl nesans
Li te chwazi m pou m soufri yon ti tan sou tè a
Pèp mwen an va aviye ak yon vèman wayal
Byento n'a va wè l
Se va mèvèye

M'ap ret tann jou sa lè m va wè bote l
Lè m va venkè sou lespri lachè k nan mwen
Mwen te rachte avèk san sovè m nan
Nou va anleve
Se va laviktwa

Consider the lilies
They don’t toil nor spin
And there’s not a king
with more splendor than them
Consider the sparrows
They don’t plant nor sow
But they’re fed by the Master
who watches them grow.

He is Lord, He is Lord
He has risen from the dead
He is Lord
Every knee shall bow
Every tongue confess
That Jesus Christ is Lord.

Mèsi pou solèy la kap klere kò a
Mèsi pou pawòl ou kap nouri nanm mwen
Ou ban-m yon verite ke-m pat gen avan
Ou se yon bon sovè,sen e veritab.
Li se Senyè, li se Senyè
Li te leve nan lamò, li se Senyè
Tout jenou flechi, tout lang konfese
Jezi-kris se Senyè.

Here I am, humbling myself
Under your mighty hands
I’ve recognized if I do your will
you’ll bless me ‘til the end dear Lord
Through out my many faults and all my trials
You have never left me 
I’ve realized if I’m still here you have chosen me.

Dear Lord I bow before your throne
With all my burdens
There is no way for me to hide all of my problems
Although I’ve tried, never succeed
All of my efforts would be in vain
When I’m alone in despair you see them.

It’s by your grace, dear Lord
I’m here living a clean life
Give me more courage and holy spirit
To help me overcome some day
I’ll never worry for what’s ahead of me
In this road that I trout
I’ve realized if I’m still here
You have chosen me.

Men mwen devan w
M vle imilye m sou men puisant Ou
Mwen rekonèt si m fè volonte w
Bonte w p'ap janm fini pou mwen
Malgre fòt mwen yo
Ak eprev mwen yo
Ou p'ap janm kite m sèl
Men w fè m konnen
Si m la toujou
Ou gen yon plan pou mwen

Segnè mwen pwostène devan w ak fado mwen yo
Mwen pa kapab kache ou pwoblèm mwen yo
Menm si m ta vle kache w yo
Tout efò m yo ta anven
Tout solitid sou visaj mwen ou wè yo

Se gras a ou
Segnè ki fè m'ap viv jodi a
Ban m plis krent ou ak Sentespri ou
Ki va ede m rive yon jou
M' pa enkyete mwen pou sa k va rive
Sou chemen w avèk mwen
Si w ka chwazi m pou m sèvi ou
Ou g'on plan pou mwen

Fall on me, fall on me
Sweet holy spirit, fall on me
Fill me now with thy power
Sweet holy spirit fall on me.

Tonbe sou mwen, tonbe sou mwen
Dous pwisans sentespri
Tonbe sou mwen
Ranpli mwen ak lespri ou
Dous pwisans sentespri
Tonbe sou mwen.

Like the woman at the well
I was seeking for things that could not satisfy
And then I heard my savior speaking:
“Draw from my well that never shall run dry”

Fill my cup Lord, I lift up Lord
Come and squench this thirsting in my soul
Bread from heaven feed me
Till I want no more
Fill my cup, fill it up and make me whole.

There are millions in this word who are craving
The pleasures earthly things afford
But none can match the wondrous treasure
That I find in Jesus Christ my Lord.

Tankou fam samaritèn
Nanm mwen t’ap chèche
Bagay ki pat kap satisfè-m
Mwen t’ap tande vwa Jezi kap di
Tire dlo nan pwi a ki pa janm seche.

Plen tas mwen Senyè
Mwen leve-l devan-w
Vin ban-m bwè pou-m pa janm swaf ankò
Pen syèl la fè-m manje-l
Pou-m pa grangou ankò
Plen tas mwen, plen li nèt
E fè-m vin byen.

In the morning when I rise
In the morning when I rise
In the morning when I rise
Give me Jesus.

Give me Jesus
Give me Jesus
Give me Jesus
You can have all this world
But give me Jesus.

And when I am alone
And when I am alone
And when I am alone
Give me Jesus.

And when I come to die
And when I come to die
And when I come to die
Give me Jesus.

Le maten lè-m leve
Le maten lè-m leve
Le maten lè-m leve ban mwen Jezi.

Ban mwen Jezi
Ban mwen Jezi
Ou te mèt pran tout le mond
Men ban mwen Jezi.

E lè mwen pou kont mwen
E lè mwen pou kont mwen
E lè mwen pou kont mwen
Ban mwen Jezi.

Lè mwen prèt pou-m mouri
Lè mwen prèt pou-m mouri
Lè mwen prèt pou-m mouri
Ban mwen Jezi.

Give what you have
And the Lord will give you more
Give what you have
There’s plenty more in store
If you give what you have
He will open heaven’s door
If you give what you have for the Lord.

Bay sa-w genyen an
Le Senyè va ba ou-l ankò
Bay sa-w genyen an
Gen anpil nan grenye a
Si ou bay sa-w genyen an
Pòt syèl la va louvri
Si ou bay sa-w genyen pou le Senyè.

God is building a house
God is building a house
God is building a house that will stand
It is being put together
By the lively stone he gathers
God is building a house that will stand.

Kris ap bati yon mezon
Kris ap bati yon mezon
Kris ap bati yon mezon kap kanpe
L’ap rasanble yo ansanm
Ini yo kòm pyè presyez
Kris ap bati yon mezon kap kanpe.

God is good all the time
He put a song of praise
In this heart of mine
God is good all the time
Through the darkess night
His light will shine
God is good, God is good all the time.

Bon Dye bon pou tou tan
Li met yon chan louwanj 
nan pwofon nanm mwen
BonDye Bon pou tou tan
Nan mitan tenèb , li fè lumyè briye
Bon Dye bon, Bon Dye bon
Pou tou tan.

Many times in childhoold
When we’d travel so far
By night fall how weary I’d grow
Father’s arms would slip round me
So gently he’d say
My child we’re going home.

Going home, going home
There’s nothing to hold me here
Well I’ve caught a glimpse of that heavenly land
Praise God I’m going home

Now the twilight is fading
And the day soon shall end
I get home sick the father
I roam but my father has led me
Each step of the way
And now we’re going home.

Anpil fwa nan jenès mwen
Lè-m vwayaje lwen
Avan solèy kouche m’fatige
Bra papa-m anbrase mwen
Tou dousman l’ di-m:
“Pitit mwen n’pral lakay”.

M’pral lakay
Mwen pral lakay
Pa gen anyen k’pou kenbe-m isi
M’ap chanje vye kò sa
Pou yon bèl site
Glwa a Dye mwen pral lakay.

Li kòmanse fè nwa
E jounen an pral fini
Mwen pa kapab tann pou-m rive lakay
Papa-m ap kondwi-m
Chak pa mwen fè nan wout la
Kounya mwen pral lakay.

There are many who are searching for riches
While others seek a title to hold
There are many who will strive
For the pleasures of this life
I’m just asking more grace for my soul.

Grace to overcome every trial and test
Grace to stand for you
Dear Lord and do my very best
Grace to tell the world of your saving’s plan
That’s all I ask of thee dear Lord
Is grace to stand.

I’m not asking You to move my temptations
For even you Lord had to travel this road
I’m not asking you to spare
All the burdens I must bear
I’m just asking more grace for my soul.

I’m not asking for a life of contentment
Before a crown there’s a cross to bear
I’m not asking to get by
Without going through the fire
I’m just asking more grace for my soul.

Gen anpil moun k’ape chèche anpil richès
Pandan gen lòt kap chèche pou yo gen renome
Gen anpil moun kap debòde
Pou plezi nan mond sa
Senyè-m mande-w
Plis gras pou nanm mwen.

Gras pou-m sumonte tout eprèv yo
Gras pou-m efòse-m
Pou-m kapab vin sanble ak ou
Gras pou-m fè le mond konnen plan sali
Tout sa-m mande-w
Jezi se fòs pou-m reziste.

Senyè m-pa mande-w pou chase tantasyon-m yo
Paske ou menm tou w’te dwe pase
Nan chemen an
Mwen pa mande-w pou epanye-m
De fado ke-m dwe pote
Senyè-m mande-w
Plis gras pou nanm mwen.

Mwen pa mande-w yon vi ki ranpli ak plezi
Avan kourònman genyen kwa pou-m pote
Mwen pa mande-w pou-m rive
San-m pa pase nan dife a
Senyè-m mande-w
Plis gras pou nanm mwen.

Gen yon bu pou tout bagay
Bon Dye montre mwen
E pafwa m’ta ka vle bronche e tonbe
Jezi-m priye-w pou-m fidèl
Nan eprèv ke-m va pase
Senyè-m mande-w
Plis gras pou nanm mwen.

Hallelujah, anyhow
I’ll never let my worries get me down
Whatever trials life may bring
I’ll hold my head up high and sing
Hallelujah, anyhow.

Alelouya nenpòt jan
M’pap kite satan lage-m nan tristès
Nenpòt ki sa lavi pote
M’ap leve men mwen m’ap chante
Alelouya nenpòt jan.

He can turn the tides and calm the angry sea
He alone decides who writes a symphony
He lights every star that makes our darkness
bright
He keeps watch all through each long and lonely
night
He still finds the time to hear a child’s first prayer
Saint or sinner call and always find him there
Though it makes him sad
To see the way we live He’ll always say I forgive.

He can grant a wish or make a dream come true
He can paint the clouds and turn the gray to blue
He alone knows where to find the rainbow’s end
He alone can see what lies beyond the bend
He can touch a tree and turn the leaves to glod
He knows every lie that you and I have told
He’ll always say I forgive.

Li pouse vag yo e-l kalme lame a 
Li men-m sel deside tout sa ki pou fet 
Li klere tout zetwal pou briye teneb yo 
Li gade nou pandan tout long nwit nou yo 
Li jwen-n tan pou'l tande priye piti li yo 
Men-m sa yo-k peche rele-l e yo jwen-n li 
Men sa fe li tris pou jan ke-l we nap viv 
L- toujours di, m-padone'w.

Li kab pemet nou realize rev nou yo
Li kab chanje koule sikonstans nou yo
Li sel ki kon-n le tout bagay va fini 
Li men sel ki kab we pi lwen pase nou
Li kab touche nou e fe nou vi-n chanje
Li konn sa-k nan ke-m e men-m sa-w gen nan ke-w 
Men sa fe li tris pou jan ke-l we nan viv 
L-toujou di-m padone'w

He had compassion on me
He touched my eyes, and now I see
He healed my feat and now I walk in his way
He had compassion on me
And from my sin he set me free
Oh praise the Lord
He had compassion on me.

He had compassion on me
He touched my eyes, and now I see
He healed my feat and now I walk in his way
He had compassion on me
And from my sin he set me free
Oh praise the Lord
He had compassion on me.

He is exalted, He is exalted
He is exalted on high
Creation shall praise him
Saints shall adore him
He is exalted on high.

Nou dwe egzalte, nou dwe egzalte
Nou dwe egzalte nom li
Kreyatu louwe li
Tout sen adore
Nou dwe egzalte nom li.

God sent the manna it settled like the dew
Their foolish hearts, were hardened
And all they saw was food
No they couldn’t hear
What God was saying that day
Each bite of manna said I’m with you all the way.

He lifts me up when I’m down and discouraged
He gives me hope when I’m tempted to despair
Just when I think that I’m alone in my struggle
He finds a special way to show me He is there.

God sent his son that manna from above
Their foolish hearts, were hardened
They didn’t want his love
No they couldn’t hear
what God wassaying that day
I sent my precious son to washyour sins away.

Bon Dye voye la mann kòm laroze
Kè yo te di,yo pat konpran
Yo sèlman wè manje
Non yo pat kapab tande sa Bon Dye tap di
Chak mòso lamann di mwen avè-w tou lè jou.

Li leve mwen, lè-m tonbe, dekouraje
Li banm espwa, lè-m ta vle dezespere
E lè-m panse m’pou kont mwen
Nan pwoblèm mwen yo
Avèk amou li montre mwen ke’l toujou la.

He paid a debt he did not owe
I owed a debt I could not pay
I needed someone to wash my sins away
And now I sing a brand new song
Amazing grace, alleluia
Jesus Christ apid a debt
That I could never pay.

Kris pey’on dèt li pat janm dwe
M’te dwe yon dèt m’pat kab peye
M’te bezw’on sovè pou lave peche-m yo
Kounye a m’jwenn yon chan nouvo
Gras enfini alelouya
Jezi Kris pey’on dèt
M’pat janm kapab peye.

titles.ht: Li met yom lumye na vale a

stanzas.text:
He put a light down in the valley
So that we might see the way
He takes our hand and guides us
Till we come to a perfect day
To us a give a promise
The most wondrous ever made
A hope to live throughout eternity

Li met yon lumye nan vale a 
 pou mwen ka we chemen an
li kenbe menm 
li gidem poum rive nan jou pafe a
lifem yom pwomes ki si meveye 
kel te kapab fe 
yon plas poum rete pou leternite

He set me free, he set me free
He broke the bonds of prison for me
I’m glory bound my Jesus to see
For glory to God, He set me free.

Kris fè-m vin lib, Kris fè-m vin lib
Li kase tout chèn prizon pou mwen
Nan wout pou la glwa m’a wè Jezi
Glwa alelouya Kris fè-m vin lib.

Shackled by a heavy burden
‘Neath a load of guilt and shame
Then the hand of Jesus touched me
And now I am no longer the same.

He touched me, O He touched me
And O the joy that floods my soul
Something happened, and now I know
He touched me and made me whole.

Since I met this blessed Savior
Since He cleansed and made me whole
I will never cease to praise Him
I’ll shout it while eternity rolls.

Kè-m te chaje ak fado lou
Peche ak wont te kouvri-m
Alò men Jezi te touche-m
Kounye a mwen santi m’vin chanje.

Li touche-m, o li touche-m
E la jwa te neye nanm mwen
Yon bagay te pase kounye a m’konnen
Li touche-m nan gran bonte li.

Depi-m te jwenn Sovè beni an
Depi-l te sove-m geri-m
Mwen pap janm suspann louwe li
M’ap chante glwa-l pou letènite.

He’s all I need when I just need someone to talk to
He’s always there to hear my prayer
Each time I call Him
All my needs He will supply 
My thirsty soul He satisfies
He’s the Lord of all, and He’s all I need.

He comforts me when I’m weary
Eases every pain
Feels my deepest longing time and time again
He’s my soul inspiration, my heart consolation
He’s my everything and He’s all I need.

He’s all I need, I need not turn to any other
For He’s a friend
A friend who’s closer than a brother
On this friend, I can rely
to be my strenght as time goes by
He’s the Lord of Lords and He’s all I need.

Se li m’bezwen lè-m vle yon moun
Pou mwen kap pale
Li toujou la pou-l tande priyè-m
Chak fwa-m rele li
L’ap pran swen tout bezwen yo
E li kap satisfè nan mwen
Li se Senyè a
Se li menm ke-m bezwen.

L’rekonfòte-m lè-m boulvèse
L’pran swen traka-m yo
L’ranpli dezi kè mwen
Chak jou nan lavi-m
Li se enspirasyon nanm mwen
Konsolasyon kè mwen
Li se tout pou mwen
Se li menm ke-m bezwen.

Se li m’bezwen m’pa vle repoze-m
Sou yon lòt moun
Li s’on zanmi yon pi bon zanmi
Ke yon frè mwen
M’kap depann mwen de Jezi
E li se fòs nan lavi mwen
Li se Senyè a se li menm ke-m bezwen.

He’s coming back, he said he would
He’s coming back again
Oh praise his holy name
He’s coming back again
He’s coming back, he said he would
he’s coming back again
oh praise the Lord, he’s coming back again.

Lap retounen li anonse nou 
lap retounen anko
o beni sen non presye’l 
lap retounen anko 
lap retounen li anonse nou 
lap retounen anko
 o glwa a Dye lap retounen anko

He’s given life to me
He’s given life to you
Praise his holy name
Through God’s ministry
The truth has set us free
He’s given life to you and me.

Kris te ban mwen lavi
Kris te ba ou lavi
Beni non presye l
Pa ministè Bondye
Laverite fè m lib
Li ban m lavi
Li ba w lavi

I sense an awesome moving of the Holy Spirit
And I see His countenance, resting on your face
I know that there are angels hovering all around us
For the presence of the Lord is in this place

He is here hallelujah
He is here amen
He is here, holy holy
I will bless his name again
He is here listen closely
Hear him calling out your name
He is here, you can touch him
You will never be the same.

I searched for peace among the shadows dark and lonely
And I gave up on finding that strong and lasting love
I tasted all the things that sin could think to offer me
But today I feast on manna from above

Mwen santi pisans lespri Bondye ape aji
Mwen wè laglwa repouze sou vizaj ou
Mwen konnen genyen zanj Bondye nan mitan nou
Paske m santi prezans Bondye 
L nan plas sa

Li prezan, alelouya!
Li prezan, amèn!
Li prezan, O! Sen dè sen
Mwen va lwe non l ankò
Li prezan ou kab tande l'ap pase tou prè ou
Li prezan ou kab touche l
Ou p'ap tounen menm jan ankò

Mwen t'ap chèche lapè
Toupatou sèl e konfi
M te dekouraje nan chèche lanmou
Mwen te eseye tout sa lachè kab ofri mwen
Jodi a m fete nan lanmou ki sot anwot

He’s sweet I know, He’s sweet I know
Dark clouds may rise
And stormy winds may blow
I’ll tell the world wherever I may go
That I’ve found a savior
And He’s sweet I know.

Li dous pou mwen, li bon pou mwen
Syèl la mèt nwa e loraj met gwonde
M'vle di lemond antye kote m pase
mwen jwenn yon sovè e li dous pou mwen

Heavenly Father I appreciate you
Heavenly father I appreciate you
I love you, adore you
I bow down before you
Heavenly father I appreciate you.

Papam nan syel la mwen apresye ou
Papm nan syel la mwen apresye ou 
 mwen renmen’w m’adorew
E’m koubem devan ou
 Papam nan syel la mwen adore ou

Many times I’m tried and tested
As I travel day by day
Often I meet with pain and sorrow
And there’s trouble in the way
But I have the sweet assurance
That my soul the Lord will lead
And in him there is strength for every need.

Oh his grace is sufficient for me
And his love is abundant and free
And what joy feels my soul
Just to know, just to know
That his grace is sufficient for me.

When the tempter brings confusion
And I don’t know what to do
On my knees I turn to Jesus
For I know he’ll see me through
Then despair is changed to victory
Every doubt just melts away
And in him there is hope for every day.

ANPIL FWA MWEN AP VOYAJE
M’JWENN TRAKA NAN TOUT JOU M YO
SOUVAN M’ GEN DOULÈ AK CHAGREN
E GEN PROBLÈM NAN WOUT LA
WI, MWEN GEN YON GRAN ASIRANS
JEZU AP GIDE NANM MWEN
SE NAN JEZU K’ GEN FÒS
POU TOUT BEZWEN

O! WI, GRAS JEZU SIFI POU MWEN
AMOU LI SI ABONDAN, SAN LIMIT
E JWA RANPLI NANM MWEN
FÈ M KONNEN MWEN KONNEN,
WI, KE GRAS JEZU SIFI POU MWEN

LÈ ENNMI SIMEN KONFIZYON
E MWEN PA KONN SA POU M FÈ
KA M KONNEN DESANN SOU JENOU M
BAY JEZU, LI VA WÈ MWEN
E TOUT BAGAY CHANJE AN VIKTWA
MWEN PA GENYEN KRENT ANKÒ
WI SE NAN LI KI GEN ESPWA CHAK JOU

His name is Jesus, his name is Jesus
the mention of his name thrills me inside
He’ll never leave me, he’ll walk beside me
He’ll never let me walk alone

Non li se Jezi
Non li se Jezi
Puisans non sa a
Tresayi nanm mwen
Li p'ap janm abandone m
Li va toujou bò kote m
E li p'ap janm kite m mache sèl

As I walked through the doors
I sensed His presence
And I knew this was a place where love abounds
For this is a temple Jehovah God abides here
We are standing
In His presence on Holy Ground.

We are standing on Holy Ground
And I know that there are angels all around
Let us praise Jesus now
We are standing in his presence on Holy Ground.

In His presence there is joy beyond all measure
And at his feet sweet peace of mind
Can still be found
If you have a need I know he has the answer
Reach out and claim it
For we are standing on Holy Ground.

Nan prezans li
Gen yon jwa ki san mezi
E nan pye li lespri nou ka vin trankil
Si-n priye-l pou bezwen nou yo
Li ka reponn
Sèlman kwè li
Ka nou kanpe sou yon tè ki sen.

Nou kanpe sou yon tè ki sen
Ka nou konnen nou antoure avèk zanj Bon Dye yo
A nou louwe-l kounye a
Ka nou konnen nou kanpe nan prezans li
Sou yon tè ki sen.

Lè-m t’ap rantre nan tanp la m’santi prezans li
E-n konnen nan plas sa nou kap jwenn lanmou
Sa se tanp kot Jeova Bon Dye abite
Ka nou kanpe nan prezans li
Sou yon tè ki sen.

When I look at my life
All the days and all the nights
I must say Thank You
The people I have known
The places I have gone
I must say Thank You
If I had it to do again
With my family and my friends
I would still serve you
For you have been a friend
I’ll be your servant ‘til the end
Lord, I love you.

How do I repay?
How do I say thank you?
For all the little things you’ve done
Through the years to say thank You
All I know to do
Is to lift my hands to You and say thank you.
For I know I can’t repay
But with my voice I want to say thank You.

For all the tender care
You are always there
I must say Thank You
Through the darkest night
you were by my side
I must say Thank you
The mountains may have been high
And the valleys have been low 
but I still Thank you
And no matter come, what may
I will lift my voice and say
Lord, I Thank You.

Lè mwen gade lavi-m, tout jou yo, tout nwit yo
Mwen dwe di-w mèsi
Tout moun ke-m te konnen, tout kote m’konn ale
Mwen dwe di-w mèsi
Si-m te gen pou-m fè sa ankò
Ak tout fanmi-m, zanmi-m yo
M’t’ap toujou sèvi-w
Ou te toujou zanmi-m
Mwen vle sèvi-w jiska lafen
Senyè m’renmen-w.

Kòman m’ dwe peye-w
Kòman pou-m di-w mèsi
Pou tout sa ke-w te fè pou mwen nan lavi-m
M’ap di-w mèsi
Tout sa-m gen pou-m fè
Se leve men mwen anlè e di-w mèsi
Ka-m konnen m’pap ka peye-w
M’vle leve vwa-m sèlman pou-m di-w mèsi.

Nan tout bezwen mwen yo ou toujou avè-m
Mwen dwe di-w mèsi
Nan moman tenèb yo ou te bò kote-m
Mwen dwe di-w mèsi
Montay yo konn parèt wo e vale yo konn si ba
Mwen vle di-w mèsi
E nenpòt sa k’ta vini
M’vle leve vwa-m pou-m di Senyè mèsi.

Lè eprèv yo vini e nan tribilasyon yo
M’ap di-w mèsi
Nan mitan tanpèt yo lè montay yo byen wo
M’ap di ou mèsi
Mwen pap janm bliye mizèrikòd ou anvè mwen
M’ap di ou mèsi
Pa gen lòt kote m’ale pou-m jwenn amou sa
Ke-m jwenn nan
Senyè m’renmen-w.

How great is our God, how great is his name
He’s the greatest one, forever the same
He rolled back the water of the mighty red sea
And he said I’m going to lead you, just follow me.

Ala Dye nou an gran
Ala non li gran
Se li menm ki pi gran
Li pi gran pou tout tan
Li pouse yon dlo puisan
Nan lanme wouj
E li di li va kondui w
Selman suiv li.

I adore you, Lord
And I worship you
I give thanks to you
Sing prise to you for everything
For everything you’ve done for me
For every truth you’ve let me see
I worship you, I worship you my king.

Seyne map adorew e map ba ou glwa
map di ou mesi 
loure’w po tout sa ke wap fe
pou tout sa ke ou fe pou mwen 
pou verite ke’w te fem we 
 map adorew e map loure’w wa mwen

God Picked up a sparrow that could no longer fly
He brushed off its wounds
And then watched it soar into the sky
If He’s mindful of creation, on this I can depend
I am his child and I can place all my trust in Him.

I can trust Jesus, I can trust Jesus
He never once has failed to meet my need
He is my strong tower
The strength in my weakest hour
I can trust Jesus
He takes care of me.

I have prayed some prayers
And felt they never were heard
But I held to God’s hands
And kept right on trusting in his word
My wants and God’s desires don’t always agree
But I lean on his will
For He always knows what’s best for me.

Bondye pran yon ti Zwazo ki pat menm ka vole
Li geri ple’l yo el kite’l vole byen wo nan syel la
menm jan l’pran swen kreyatil yo

map met tout konfyans mwen nan li

Mwen kwe nan Jezu
Mwen kwe nan Jezu

I thought number one would surely be me,
I thought I could be what I wanted to be.
I thought I could build on life's sinking sand
But I can't even walk without You holding my hand.

I can’t even walk
Without you holding my hands
The mountains too high
And the valleys too wide
Down on my knees
I’ve learned to stand
Because I can.t even walk
Without you holding my hands.

I thought I had done a lot on my own.
I thought I could make it all alone.
I thought of myself as that man who can,
But I can't even walk without You holding my hand

I think I'll make Jesus my One and my All
From now on when I'm in trouble, only His name I'll call
And If I can't trust Him, I'll be less of a man
'Cause I can't even walk without You holding my hand.

M’te panse nimero en tap toujou mwen menm
M’te panse mwen tap sa ke-m ta vle ye
M’te panse mwen te kab bati yon vi mèvèye
Men-m pa menm kab mache
San ou pa kenbe men-m.

M’pa menm kap mache si ou pa kenbe men-m
Montay yo si wo e vale yo two laj
Se sou jenou-m m’ap aprann pou-m rete
Paske m’pa menm kap mache
Si ou pa kenbe men-m.

M’te panse m’te kab rive pou kont mwen
M’te panse mwen te kab rive sèl
M’te panse de tèt mwen kòm yon gran òm
Men-m pa menm kab mache
San ou pa kenbe men-m.

Yon jou mwen te remèt Jezi tout vi mwen
E lè-m nan pwoblèm yo m’envoke nom-l
E si-m pat konfye-m nan li m’ta san valè
Men-m pa menm kab mache
San ou pa kenbe men-m.

titles.en: I JUST CAN’T PRAISE HIM ENOUGH

stanzas.text:
I just can’t praise him enough
I just can’t praise him enough
I just can’t tell you how much he means to me
He took my feet off the merry clay
And put them on the rock to stay
I just can’t praise him enough
For what he’s done for me.

M’pap janm louwe-l ase
M’pap janm ba-l glwa ase
M’pap janm finn di tout sa li fè pou mwen
Li retire-m sou te glise
li mete pye-m sou wòk solid
M’pap janm louwe-l ase pou sa li fè pou mwen.

Idon’t know much but I feel your touch
So here I am Lord
You took your time to ease my mind
So here I am Lord
You give me a chance to make the bride
So here I am Lord
You touch my my heart, made me a part
So here I am Lord.

M pa konn anpil men m santi yon touche
Men mwen devan w Segnè!
Ou pran tan ou geri panse m
Men mwen devan w Segnè!
Ou ban m yon chans pou m fè lepouz
Men mwen devan w Segnè!
Ou touche kè m fè m yon pati de ou
Men mwen devan w Segnè!

titles.ht: pa gen anyen nan mond sa

stanzas.text:
One day, I heard a voice
Saying make the Lord your choice
He'll take away your every sin and set you free
So I came to him that day
And he took my sins away
I don't want nothing here to hinder me.

I don't want nothing here to hinder me
For someday his blessed face I long to see
It makes no difference what the cost
Oh how heavy may be my cross
I don't want nothing here to hinder me.

Many times I'm tossed about
Many times I do without
Many times my heart is burdened down with care
But I know if I'll stand true
That some day he'll see me thru
If I won't let nothing here to hinder me.

Yon jou m te tande yon vwa ki di si ou chwazi mwen
Mwen va pran pwoblèm ou yo e fè w vin lib
Mwen t al jwenn li nan jou sa a, li te lave peche mwen
Pa g anyen nan mond sa a k ap kenbe mwen

Pa g anyen nan mond sa a k ap kenbe mwen
Gran jou sa a se fas a fas mwen vle wè li
Menm si l koute pri lavi mwen
Menm si kwa a ta vin twò lou
Pa g anyen nan mond sa a k ap kenbe mwen

Yon jou lè m ale lakay p ap genyen chagren ankò
Se lèzanj, lèbyenneme ke nou va wè
Nou va depoze vye kwa a, resevwa kouwòn de glwa a

I feel Jesus in this place
Yes my soul does burn within me

M santi Jezi (3x)

M santi Jezi nan plas sa a

I have so much to thank you for, Dear Jesus
I have so much to thank you for, Blessed Lord
You gave me eyes that I might see
A chance to someday be like Thee
I have so much to thank you for precious Lord.

Mwen gen anpil pou-m di-w mèsi Chè Jezi 
Mwen gen anpil pou-m di-w mèsi Presye Senyè 
Ou ban mwen zye pou-m kapab wè 
Yon chans pou-m renye avèk ou yon jou 
Mwen gen anpil pou-m di-w mèsi Presye Senyè.

I just feel like something good is about to happen
I just feel like something good is on its way
He has promised that he’d open all of heaven
And brother it could happen any day
When God’s people humble themselves
To call on Jesus
And they to heaven expecting as they pray
I just feel like something good is about to happen
And brother this could be that any day.

Wi-m dekouvri yon mèvèy ki pa lwen pou rive 
Wi-m dekouvri yon mèvèy sou wout la tou 
Kris pral louvri tout pòt ak fenèt nan syèl la 
Zanmi mwen sa ka rive nenpòt jou

titles.ht: Map leve menm a wam nan

stanzas.text:
I lift my hands in honor and glory to the King
Alleluias and blessings and praises now I bring
My heart no longer your blessings can contain
So I worship and magnify your name.

Map leve menm a wa’m nan
poum ba’l one e glwa 
ak Alelouya e louwanj
ak kantik map ofril
kem ap debode
ak benediksyon’w yo

I love you Lord and I lift my voice
To worship you, O my soul rejoice
Take joy my King in what you hear
Let me be a sweet, sweet sound in your ear.

M’renmen-w Senyè E mwen leve vwa-m pou-m adore-w 
O nanm mwen rejwi Rejwi Wa mwen Nan sa ke-w tande 
Fè mwen vin yon son ki dous Nan zòrèy ou.

I need a touch from you Jesus
I need a touch from you Lord
You can heal my body
You can heal my soul
Just a touch from you Lord
Can make me whole.

M-bezwen yon touche nan men-w Jezu
M-bezwen yon-touche du Senyè
Ou kab geri kò mwen
Ou kab geri nanm mwen
Si-w touche-m, O Jezu, mwen va ge

I proclaim Thee name oh Lord
And declare Thee majesty
With my hands lifted high
And my mouth filled with praise
I proclaim and exalt Thee.

M’pwoklame nom ou, O Senyè E-m deklare-w 
Majeste Avèk men-m leve wo E bouch mwen plen louwanj 
M’pwoklame e-m egzalte nom ou.

Irequire all within me
To sing praise unto the Lord
For he’s done so many things
That’ll remain a mystery
I have nothing to repay
This great Saviour in my life
So I’ll lift my hands toward heaven

M’rekòmande tout sa-k nan mwen 
Pou fè louwanj Bon Dye-m nan Paske-l fè anpil bagay 
kap rete yon mistè M’pa gen lajan pou-m peye Bon sovè a nan lavi-m
M’ap leve de men-m anlè Pou-m fè louwanj pou Bon Dye.

titles.en: I WANT JESUS IN MY LIFE
titles.ht: Pran tout richès k'ap detwi m

stanzas.text:
I want Jesus in my life more than anything
This world could offer me
For I know that he alone can satisfy
Just to know his leading in my life
Is worth everything that I must sacrifice
oh I want Jesus more than anything.

Take the fame that I might want
And all the things that seem so dear
I’d rather have him than any praise
That men may give to me
I want him to have control
And be the breath of life in me
I’d rather have Jesus
I’d rather have him than anything.

He had power without endfrom the heavens
He ruled the universe
Countless angels waited on his every call
But one day I saw him all alone
On a road to death and untold agony
Just for me He suffered what a price He paid.

Mwen vle Jezi nan lavi m
Plis ke tout lòt bagay lemonn ta ka ofri
Ka m konnen se li menm sèl kap satisfè mwen
Sèlman pou m konnen l ap dirije m
Sa vo tout sakrifis ak pri ke mwen peye

Pran tout richès kap detwi m

M pito gen Jezi pase tout glwa lèzòm ta kapab bay
Mwen vle Jezi gen kontwol
E pou l se sous lavi nanm mwen
Mwen pito gen Jezi
M pito gen Jezi ke tout lòt bagay
