Se pou mwen li te soufri. Konbyen mwen dwe?

I want to magnify the name of the Lord
His name I’ll praise
for he has been so good and so kind to me
All of my days
When I was lost in darkness
He heard my plea and rescued me
Now I’ll serve him all of my life
‘til his face I see

Mwen vle mayifye non segne mwen an
loure non li
paske li bon si bon e li bon pou mwen 
nan tout lavi’m
lem te pedi na

I will serve thee, because I love Thee
You have given life to me
I was nothing before you found me
You have given life to me.

Heartaches, broken pieces
Ruined lives are why you died on Calvary
Your touch was what I longed for
You have given life to me.

M ap sèvi ou paske m renmen ou
Se ou ki te ban mwen lavi.
Mwen pa t anyen avan w te jwenn mwen
Se ou ki ban mwen lavi o-o-o

Twa ka m fin gaspiye
Nan lemonn, nan fè peche lachè
Ou sove m mwen pral nan syèl
Se sa mwen te bezwen.

I’d rather have Jesus, than silver or gold
I’d rather be His, than have riches untold
I’d rather have Jesus, than houses or lands
I’d rather be led by His nail-pierced hand.

Than to be the King of a vast domain
Or be held in sin’s dread sway
I’d rather have Jesus than anything
This world affords today.

He’s fairer than lilies of rarest bloom
He’s sweeter than honey from out of the comb
He’s all that my hungering spirit needs
I’d rather have Jesus and let Him lead.

Mwen pito gen Jezi pase gwo lajan
Mwen pito pou li, pase m ta rich toutan,
Mwen pito gen Jezi pase pi bèl kay;
Pito li gide mwen nan tout bagay.

Pase pou m ta wa nan yon gran peyi,
Lè peche m ta fè m soufri;
Pito m gen Jezi pase tout bagay
Lemonn ta janm kapab bay.

Nanm mwen di wi Senye
Mwen va fe volonte ou
Nanm mwen di wi Senye,
Ma’p konfye’w map obeyi’w
Le lespri’w pale ave’m,
ak tout fos mwen map dako
E repons mwen se va wi Senye

I say yes, oh yes
to your will and to your way
I say yes oh yes, I will trust you and obey
when your spirit speaks to me
With my whole heart I’ll agree
And my answer will be yes oh yes.

I am blessed, I am blessed
Every day that I wake up I am blessed
When I wake up in the morning
Til I lay my head to rest.
I am blessed, I am blessed.

Mwen beni
Mwen beni
Chak jou nan lavi sa
Mwen beni
Lè mwen leve lematen
Jiskaske m'al kouche
Mwen beni
Mwen beni

titles.en: I AM BOUND FOR THE KINGDOM
titles.ht: Wi mwen prale nan peyi moun libere

stanzas.text:
You may ask me where I’m headed
You may ask me where I’m bound
Well I’m going to a country ‘cross the sea
And I know I’ll have a mansion
And I know I’ll have a crown
Well, I’m bound for the kingdom of the free.

Yes, I’m bound for the Kingdom
Of the blessed and the free
And my Jesus soon is coming after me
There is nothing to compare
With the glory over there
Yes, I’m bound for the kingdom of the free.

Well, I’m going to a country
Where they say we’ll never die
‘Twill be endless joy and glory there for me
Yes, I know I’ll live forever in that city in the sky
Well, I’m bound for the kingdom of the free.

Ou mèt mande m kibò m prale
Ou mèt mande m ki wout m'ap fè
Wi mwen prale nan yon lòt gwo peyi
E mwen konnen m va gen yon kay
E m konnen m va g'on kouwòn
Wi mwen prale nan peyi moun libere

Wi m prale nan yon peyi moun ki beni, libere
Ka Segnè m nan gen pou l vini chèche mwen
Pa gen anyen ki ka sanble avek laglwa lòtbò a
Wi m prale nan peyi moun libere

So long I had searched for life meaning
enslaved by the world and my greed
Then the door of my prison was opened by love
For the ransom was paid, I was freed.

I’m free from the fear of tomorrow
I’m free from the guilt of the past
For I’ve traded my shackles for a glorious song
I’m free praise the Lord free at last.

I’m free from the guilt that I carried
From the dull empty life I’m set free
For when I met Jesus he made me complet
He forgot the foolish man I used to be.

Mwen t’ap chèche richès nan mond sa Anbisyon, 
byen li yo te mare-m Men Bon Dye te louvri pòt prizon 
pou mwen Li peye dèt mwen yo e-l fè-m lib.

Mwen lib m’pa pè sa k’ap vin demen
Mwen lib de peche pase-m yo M’remèt fado mwen yo 
Pou yon nouvo kantik Mwen lib Glwa a Dye m’libere.

Mwen lib de tout sa m’te konn fè k’mal 
Mwen lib de panse lachè-m yo 
Lè Jezi te jwenn mwen l’te chanje vi mwen 
Li padone tout sa m’te konn fè k’ mal.

I’m glad, He laid his hand on me
So glad, He laid his hand on me
I was blind, but now I see
Since Jesus laid his hand on me.

M kontan Kris te met men l sou mwen
M si kontan Kris te met men l sou mwen
Mwen te avèg, kounye a mwen wè
Depi Jezi te met men l sou mwen

Mwen te pedi nan peche 
men Jezu jwen mwen 
mwen te mouri 
kounyea'm vivan
O glwa, e allelouia
Jezu se wa de wa

I’m going to live the way he wants me to live
I’m going to live
until there’s just no more to give
I’m going to love
Love ‘till there’s just no more love
I could never, never out love the Lord.

Mwen vle pou-m viv jan Bon Dye vle Pou mwen viv 
Mwen vle pou-m bay Jis pa gen ankò pou-m bay 
Mwen vle pou-m renmen, renmen 
Jis pa gen amou ankò 
Mwen pap jamè suspann renmen le Senyè.

I’m so thankful to Jesus
For what he’s done for me
I’m so thankful, he brought me in this way
He could have chosen someone else
To take my place
But he saved me by his mercy and grace.

Mwen si kontan nan Jezi
Pou sa li fè pou mwen,
Mwen si kontan li mete m nan wout sa a
Li te kab chwazi yon lòt moun
Pou l mete nan plas mwen
Men li sove m pa gras amou li

I’m standing on a firm foundation
Standing on the word of God
And in my heart there’s peace like a river flowing
And it flows from the throne of God.

Mwen kanpe sou fondasyon solid 
Bati sou pawòl Bon Dye Nan nanm mwen gen la jwa 
Kòm yon gran rivyè E kap koule sot nan twòn Bon Dye

If from God’s order now I should wander
Where I could go, Lord where I could go
I know that babylon no longer wants me
For too many things about it now I know
I guess the world would take me back
But I’m glad I’m off that track
For I’ve had enough of sin
And I love this peace within
So keep me Jesus, here in God’s order
For if I should leave you now
Where could I go?

Yon jou sovè m nan pale avèk mwen
Li di pitit mwen soti nan Babilòn
Lè sa l te gide m li di m prepare m
Ka m'ap ba w yon lòt chans pou w avanse

Mwen konn lemond t'ap resevwa m
Men m kontan m pa sou wout sa
Mwen te fin bouke ak peche
M renmen lapè ke m posede
O kenbe m Jezi! 
Kenbe m nan lòd sa a
Si m ta kite w kounye a kote m prale

Mwen te kòmanse vle dekouraje
Ledyab te di m mwen p'ap janmè kab rive
Men Jezi te di m pawòl li va gide m
Men m'ap genyen pou m manje zèb amè a
Mwen konn lemond p'ap resevwa m
Men m kontan m pa sou wout sa
Mwen te fin bouke ak peche
Mwen jwenn lapè ke m posede
O kenbe m Jezi
Kenbe m nan lòd sa a
Si m ta kite w kounye a kote m prale

Si mwen ta tonbe kite lòd Bondye
Kote m prale, Segnè kote m prale
Mwen konnen Babilòn p'ap janm resevwa m
Ka gen twòp bagay sou li m gentan konnen

If I don’t praise Him, somebody will
If I don’t love Him, somebody will
If I don’t lift my hands
And praise unto the Lord
Somebody will praise the Lord.

Si’w pa vle loure’l lap pran yon lot
Si’w pa vle renmen’l lap pran yon lot
siw pa vle leve men’w pa bay bondye louranj
lap met yon lot nan plas ou

When peace like a river attendeth my way
When sorrows like sea billows roll
Whatever my lot, you have taught me to say
It is well, it is well with my soul.

It is well with my soul
It is well, it is well with my soul.

Though the devil will ruin thou, trials may come
Let this blessed assurance control
That Christ has regarded my helpless estate
And He shed His own blood for my soul.

And Lord, haste the day
When my faith shall be sight
And the clouds be rolled back as a scroll
The trump shall resound and the Lord shall
descend
Even so, it is well with my soul.

La pè tankou rivyè ap koule nan nan-m mwen
Men-m si eprèv yo ta anpil
Kèlke swa soufrans Jezu apran-n mwen di
M-santi-m byen, m-santi-m byen
Nan nan-m mwen

M-santi-m byen nan nan-m mwen
M-santi-m byen, m-santi-m byen nan nan-m mwen

Enmi an mèt fache gro chagren mèt vini
Konfyans mwen nan li gen kontwol
Ka Kris ap gade tout sa map supote
Ka l-te soufri pou nan-m mwen vi-n lib

The seed you planted deep has yet to grow
You’ve wondered when you’ll reap
The things you sow
And how long has it been
Since rain has touched your ground
You’ve searched the skies
But then the rain just can’t be found.

But it will rain again
The fruit will fill the vine
The stalk will bend with wheat
The grapes burst forth with wine
So go into your field
Your work is not in vain
God promised harvest
And I know it will rain.

So lift your head today and see the task
This rain will come your way
If you will ask
So build your barns, my friend
Prepare to store the grain
The clouds are coming in
And I know it will rain.

Grenn sa ou te plante prale grandi
E ou pral rekòlte sa-w te simen
Lapli laryè sezon pral mouye jaden ou
Van yo ape vante lapli pral tonbe.

Lapli ap retounen viy yo va plen ak fwi
Branch yo va chaje ble, rezen va bay diven
Ale nan chan frè mwen travay ou pap anven
Bon Dye pwomèt ou lapli ap retounen.

Leve tèt ou frè mwen wè travay ou
Lapli a pral tonbe nan jaden ou
Fè plas nan grenye ou pou-w konsève grenn yo
Nyaj yo ap rasanble lapli pral tonbe.

titles.ht: Jezi Se Pi Bon Zanmi Mwen Genyen

stanzas.text:
Jesus is the best friend I ever had
He has done me nothing but good
He took away the bad
He lifts me up when I’m down
Cheers me when I’m sad
Jesus is the best friend I ever had.

Jezi se pi bon zanmi mwen genyen
Tout sa l fè pou mwen se byen
Li wete sa ki mal
Li leve m lè m desann
Ban m jwa lè m vin tris
Jezi se pi bon zanmi mwen genyen

titles.ht: KENBE-M SENYÈ ANBA LONBRAJ ZÈL OU

stanzas.text:
Keep me under the shadow
Of your wings dear Lord
Let the glory of the heavens through me reing
Let temptation lure me never
And’ I’ll praise your name for ever
Keep me under the shadow of your wings.

Kenbe-m Senyè anba lonbraj zèl ou chak jou
Kite glwa syèl la briye nan lavi mwen
Pa kite-m tonbe nan tantasyon
E m’ap louwe-w pou toujou
Kenbe-m Senyè anba lonbraj zèl ou chak jou.

It’s hard to take the first step
When I don’t know the way
Each turn is so uncertain
I learn to walk by faith
But you gave me a promise
That you will never leave
You will lead and guide me
Lord I do believe.

Lead me, lord, I will follow
Lead me, lord, I will go
You have called me, I will answer
Lead me, lord, I will go.

Your plans for me are perfect
I never need to fear
For though at times I feel alone
I know that you are near
My heart just longs to follow
I’m willing to obey
Take my hand and lead me
I follow all the way.

Li pa fasil pou fè premye pa
Lè-m pa konnen wout la
Detou yo pa sèten mwen vle mache pa la fwa
Men w-te fè-m yon pwomès ke ou pap jan-m kite-m
Wap kondwi-m e gide-m Senyè mwen kwè

Kondwi-m Senyè mwen va ale
Kondwi-m Senyè m-va ale
Lè ou rele-m mwen va repon-n ou
Kondwi-m Senyè m-va ale

Plan-w yo pou mwen yo pafè mwen pa bezwen pè
Men-m kan pafwa m-santi-m sèl
Mwen konnen ke ou la
Kè mwen vle pou-m swiv ou mwen vle pou-m obeyi
Pran men-m e kondwi mwen map swiv ou jusko bou

Learning to lean, learning to lean
I am learning to lean on Jesus
Finding more power than I ever dreamed
I am learning to lean on Jesus.

Aprann apiye (2x)
M’ap aprann apiye sou Jezi
M-bezwen plis pwisans ke-m pat janm posede
M’ap aprann apiye sou Jezi.

Let me fill your spirit Lord, sweeping over my soul
Let your holy presence
Cleanse and make me whole
Through life’s trials and tests dear Lord
I need your strength each day
As I lift my hands to you
Touch me Lord I pray.

Senyè fè-m santi lespri-w
Kap koule nan nanm mwen
Fè-m santi dous prezans ou
Pou mwen ka vin fò
Nan tout eprèv yo Senyè
M’mande-w banm fòs chak jou
M’ap priye-w m’leve men-m anlè
Touche mwen Senyè.

titles.en: LET ME STAY IN THE VINE

stanzas.text:
Let me stay in the vine where I was crafted
Let me work in the field where truth was find
For to me this way is so precious
And to me this place is holy ground.

Fè-m rete nan viy kote-w te grefe a
Fè mwen travay nan chan la verite
Ka pou mwen chemen sa si presye
E plas sa pou mwen se yon lye sen

Let me touch him, let me touch Jesus
Let me touch him as he passes by
Then when I shall reach out to others
They shall know him
They shall live and not die

Oh, to be his hand extend
Reaching out to the oppress’d
Let me touch him, let me touch Jesus
So that others may know and be blessed.

I was staying so far from Jesus
I was lonely had no peace within
Then the hand of my savior touched me
Now I’m reaching to others in sin.

Kite-m touche, kite-m touche Jezi
Kite-m touche-l tan l’ap pase la
E lè-l va lonje men ba lòt yo
Yo va konnen, yo va viv
N’a va sove.

O pou mwen kapab wè men ki lonje
Sovè sa yo ki oprime
Kite-m touche, kite-m touche Jezi
Konsa lòt yo kapab wè
Yo va sove.

Mwen te pèdi, pèdi lwen Jezi-kri
M’te pou kont mwen, mwen pat gen lavi
E lè sa a sovè-m nan te touche-m
Kounye a m’ap ede lòt yo kap viv nan peche.

Gen yon rivyè, yon rivyè kap koule
Ak dlo sa a li lave nanm mwen
E dlo sa fè lavi mwen briye
Sentespri plis pase lajan avèk lò.

titles.ht: An nou leve men minis Bondye yo

stanzas.text:
Let’s all lift the hands of God’s ministry
If it had not been for them
Look where you and I would be
Stand by the ones who sacrificed
And labored faithfully
Let’s all lift the hands of God’s ministry.

An nou leve men minis Bondye yo
An nou leve men minis Bondye yo
Si se pa t gras a yo menm
Kibò mwen ak ou ta ye?
Kanpe kote minis Bondye
K'ap travay fidèlman
An nou leve men minis Bondye yo

Here among the shadows in a lonely land
With strangers we’re a band
of pilgrims on the move
Thru dangers burdened down with sorrows
And we’re shunned on every hand
But we are looking for a city built above.

Looking here and there
Looking for a city, where we’ll never die
There the sainted millionsnever say goodby
There we’ll meet our Savior
And our loved ones too
Come O Holy Spirit, all our hopes renew.

Isi ba nan le mon-n sou tè etranje  
nou se pèlerin nap voyaje  
Avèk yon chay doulètout mou-n mèprize  
Nap tan-n you bèl sitè an wo a

Nap ta-n you bèl site, la pap gen mouri 
ak tout sen venkè yo pap jan-m separe 
Nap jwen-n ak sovè a, ak tout venkè yo  
Voye lespri-w Senyè ban-n fòs pou-n rive

Kèk fwan-dekouraje kè nou atriste    
Ka tout zanmi nou yo kite nou  
Nou jwen-n la kontantman 
Nan bèl promès sa nap tan-n you bèl site an wo a

Sou la tè danje sa nou pra-l tou patou 
 Nou konfye-n nan lamou sovè a
Byen ke nou etranje nan mon-n traka sa 
Nap tan-n yon bèl site nan syèl la

Love, love, love, one to another
Arm in arm helping each other
Unified by the bonds of love
We will bind old satan with love, love, love.

Amou, amou, amou youn pou lòt
Men nan men an nou ede youn lòt
Inifye-n avèk kòd amou
N’ap mare pye satan avèk amou.

Majesty, Worship his majesty
Unto Jesus be all glory, honor, and praise
Majesty, kingdom authority
Flown from his throne, unto his own
His anthem reigns.

So exalt, lift up on high the name of Jesus
Magnify, come Glorify Christ Jesus the king
Majesty, worship his majesty
Jesus who died
Now glorifies King of all Kings.

Majeste, adore majeste
Ann bay Jezi tout onè louwanj e glwa
Majeste, wayòm otorite
Sot nan twòn li , al’ jwenn pèp li
Ann ba li glwa.

Egzalte leve byen wo
Le nom de Jezi
Mayifye e glorifye Jezi-Kris kòm Wa
Majeste , adore Majeste
Kris te mouri, kounye a l’glorifye
Li se Wa dè wa.

Flowers have the sunshine
And the earth has the rain
Lord you know I’m nothing
without your spirit my life’s in vain
Mold me and make me
Help me to be more like you
Make me an instrument
Of your love brand new.

Make me an instrument of your love today
May I remember your sweet children Lord
Every time I pray
Let me see the good side
And the bad side of every day
Make me an instrument
of your love your way.

Flè yo gen solèy la
Kap briye byen wo anlè a
Kris konnen m’pa anyen
San lespri-l lavi-m ta sanble anven
Fòme-m e fè mwen
Pou-m ka vin sanble ak ou
Fè-m vin yon enstriman damou pou ou.

Fè-m vin yon enstriman damou pou jodia
Fè mwen sonje pitit ou yo
Chak jou lè m’ap priye
Fè-m wè sa ki bon, sa k’ pa bon
Chak jou nan mwen
Senyè fè-m vin yon enstriman
Damou pou ou.

My soul is crying, dear Lord to Thee
My soul is crying to be set free
From all my nature, God bless my soul
My soul is crying to be made whole.

Nanm mwen ap kriye ba ou Senyè
Nanm mwen ap kriye
Pou-l libere , de tout vye nati
K’mare nanm mwen
Nanm mwen ap kriye pou-l libere .

No I will not go Lord till you bless me
Whatever it takes break my will
Lord remake me
Break my nature, change my name
Transform my life
Cause I won’t let you go o Lord
Till you bless me.

Non mwen pa prale Senyè
Jiskaske-w beni mwen
Nenpòt sa koute kraze volonte-m
Senyè rekreye mwen
Pran nati-m, chanje nom-m
Transfòme lavi-m
Paske m’pa prale Senyè
Jiskaske-w beni mwen.

titles.en: OH LORD, I MUST SAY THANKS

stanzas.text:
Oh Lord, I must say thanks
For all you have done for me
If I’m not in the grave
There’s a purpose in that
If I praise not thy name
How ungratefull I’d be
For the things you have done
I will lift up my hands
And cry Ebenezer.

O Senyè m’ap di-w mèsi
Pou sa-w fè pou mwen
Si-m pa nan tonbo a g’on rezon pou sa
Si-m pa ta louwe nom-w
Mwen ta vrèman engra
Pou sa-w fè nan vi mwen
M’leve de men-m anlè
Pou-m kriy’Eben-Ezer.

One body, one body
One faith, one Lord
One nation, one people
O Praise the Lord.

Yon sèl kò, yon sèl kò
Yon sèl fwa, yon sèl Senyè
Yon sèl nasyon, yon sèl pèp
O glwa a Dye.

As I look around me
in these days we’re living in
I question how much longer will it be
Till the father reaches over
To touch his son on the shoulder
And say “Jesus, go my family home to me.”

And only the redeemed
Will hear his voice on that day
When he comes in clouds
Of glory to catch us all away
Our race will then be over
And the dead in Christ will rise
And we which are alive in Jesus
Will be changed in a twinkling of an eye.

Up to now we’ve been looking
Thru a glass so dark and dim
And only a few mysteries have we known
But I sense now in my spirit
His returning is upon us
And a shout and God’s
Trumpet we’ll be gone.

Lè m’ap gade kote mwen ye jodia nan mond sa
M’ap mande konbyen tan sa gen pou-l pran
Pou Papa a lonje men li
Touche Pitit la nan pouvwa-l
Pou li di Jezi ale mennen vini
Fanmi-m yo pou mwen.

Sèlman sa-k te rachte yo
Va tande vwa li jou sa
Lè-l vini nan nye de glwa li
Pou-l pran nou tout avè-l
Lè sa kous nou va fini
E mò an Kris yo va leve
E sa yo ki toujou ret vivan va chanje
Nan yon ti kout tan.

Si nou kontinye mache
Nan limyè ki devan nou an
Bon Dye va revele plan mèvèy li
Bay yon pèp ki ap travay
Pou genyen lavi etènèl
E nou va wè glwa Bon Dye nou an ak fas li.

Many times I am weary, as I journey this way
And beset by temptation in my soul day by day
Who can know what I feel
And my troubles can see
Who can make intercession with God for me?

Our high priest is Jesus, and he can be touched
With the feeling of our infirmities
For he came as a man fulfilling God’s plan to
Forgive our sins and iniquities
Let’s come boldly before his throne
That we may obtain mercy and find grace
To help in time of need.

Jesus knows what we suffer, only he understands
For he to had to dwell here
In a house made with hands
In all points he was tried and was tempted as we
That is why he is able our help to be.

There remaineth a rest now the people of God
Who will follow the Savior in the path that he trod
If we’ll have faith in him, and his word will believe
Grace and mercy abundant we will receive

Anpil fwa mwen fatige nan vwayaj sou wout la
M’ap goumen ak tantasyon
Nan nanm mwen tou lè jou
Sa kap konn janm santi-m
Sa kap wè traka-m yo
Sa kap entèsede plan Bon Dye pou mwen.

Gran prèt nou an se Jezi
Nou kap touche li
E li kap santi tout feblès nou yo
Ka li vin kòm yon nonm
Akonpli plan Bon Dye
Padone peche ak inikite-m
M’ap apwoche devan twòn li
Pou-m jwenn mizèrikòd li
Pou-m jwenn sekou gras li lè m’ bezwen.

Jezi konn sa m’ap soufri
Se li sèl ki konprann
Ka li te abite tou nan yon vye kò peche
Eprouve nan tout pwen
Kòm nou li te tante
Se sa k’ fè menm li kapab yon èd pou nou.

Gen yon repo kounye a
Pou ou pèp Bon Dye a
Kape mache tou lè jou nan mak pye sovè a
Si nou gen fwa nan li
Si nou kwè nan pawòl li
Avèk mizèrikòd li la resevwa-n.

Pass me not, o gentle Savior
Hear my humble cry
While on others thou art calling
Do not pass me by.

Savior, Savior
Hear my humble cry
While on others thou art calling
Do not pass me by.

Let me at thy throne of mercy
Find a sweet relief
Kneeling there in deep contrition
Help my belief.

Pa kite mwen O bon Sovè
Koute kriye mwen
Kon ou okipe lè zòt yo
Pa pase lwen mwen

Sovè, Sovè
Koute kriye mwen
Kon ou okipe lè zòt yo
Pa pase lwen mwen.

Devan twòn ou ban-m padon ou
Ban-m yon dous frechè
Men mwen koube nan prezans ou
Ede-m pou mwen kwè.

Mwen konfye-m sèl nan merit ou
M’ta gade ou an fas
Geri kè mwen ki nan tristès
Kenbe-m nan la gras.

Well, I’m tired and so weary
But I must go along
Till the Lord comes and calls me away, oh yes
Well the morning is bright
and the lamb is the light
And the night, night is all fair
As the day, oh yes.

There will be peace in the valley for me some day
There will be peace in the valley for me
Oh Lord I pray
There’ll be no sadness, no sorrow
No trouble, I’ll see
There will be peace in the valley for me.

There the flowers will be blooming
And the grass will be green
And the skies will be clear and serene, oh yes
Well the sun ever beams
In this valley of dreams
And no clouds there will ever be seen, oh yes.

Mwen si bouke e-m fatige
Men fò-m kontinye nan wout la
Jis le Senyè vin rele mwen
Pou mwen ale, o wi
Se yon maten ki klere bèl
Anyo a se limyè
E la nwit la va bèl kòm la jounen, o wi.

Va gen lapè nan vale pou mwen yon jou
Va gen lapè nan vale pou mwen
Senyè m’ priye-w
Pap gen tristès, ni chagren, ni traka n’a wè
Va gen lapè nan vale pou mwen.

Pap gen lamò ni maladi
Tout peche va fini
Jistis Kris va kouvri latè
Kòm dlo kouvri lamè
Pou mil an Kris va renye
Lepouz li avèk li
Tout ènnmi yo va detwi nan vale a o wi.

Praise him, praise him
Praise him in the morning
Praise him in the noon time
Praise him, praise him
Praise him when the sun goes down.

Louwe-l, louwe-l
Louwe li le maten
Louwe li a midi
Louwe-l, louwe-l
Louwe-l lè solèy kouche.

Is your burden heavy as you bear it all alone?
Does the road you travel
harbor danger yet unknown
Are you growing weary in the struggle of it all?
Jesus will help you when on His name you call.

He is always there, hearing every prayer
Faithful and true
Walking by your side In His love we hide
All the day through
When you get discouraged
Just remember what to do
Reach out to Jesus, He’s reaching out to you.

Is the life you’re living
Filled with sorrow and despair?
Does the future press you
With its worry and its care?
Are you tired and friendless
Have you almost lost your way?
Jesus will help you, just come to Him today

Eske fado-w two lou
Lè w’ap pote-l pou kont ou
Eske wout ou fè sanble gen anpil danje
Eske ou fatige avèk konba lavi sa
Touche le Senyè, L’a lonje men ba ou.

Wi li toujou la
L’tande tout priyè-w
L’fidèl li vrè
L’mache bò kote-w
Amou li vlope-w tout la jounen
Lè-w dekouraje
Sèlman sonje sa pou-w fè
Touche le Senyè, L’a lonje men ba ou.

Si vi w’ap mennen an
Chaje ak dekourajman
Enkyetid lavi sa vle pote anpil traka
Eske ou fatige avèk pwoblèm lavi sa
Jez va ede-w si-w envoke nom li.

Real, real, He’s so real to me
Real, real, He’s so real to me
Though some people doubt Him
I can’t live without him
That is why I love him so
He’s so real me.

Reyèl, reyèl, Jezi reyèl pou mwen
Reyèl, reyèl, Jezi reyèl pou mwen
Menm si moun ap doute-l
Mwen pa ka viv san li
Se pou sa mwen si renmen-l
Li si reyèl pou mwen.

With eyes cast down and hearts bowed low
We ask you now our sin to cleanse
We recognize the debt you paid
Our shame and guilt on you was laid.

We lift our hands, we lift our voice
With grateful hearts, we seek your face
This is our prayer, we ask you now
Receive our humble Praise.

No more the blood of bulls and goats
No more a tent or house of stone
For we’ve become the house you sought
A heart of flesh, your perfect home

Now let us come before your throne
With boldness as we see our need
Not looking at our filthy rags
But at the cross where grace did bleed.

Ak je fèmen ak kè kontri
Padone peche nou souple
Nou konn dèt peche-n yo peye
Wont ak fado-n yo w’te pote.

Ak men-n anlè n’ap leve vwa-n
Ak kè brize n’vle wè fas ou
Se priyè nou n’mande-w souple
Resevwa louwanj nou Senyè.

Ou pa bezwen san bèt ankò
Ou pa bezwen yon kay an wòch
Ou fè de nou kay ou vle a
Yon kè an chè, kay pafè-w la.

Ann vin devan twòn Bon Dye a
Koube-n devan-l pou bezwen-n yo
Pa kite peche-n yo mare-n
Pou yo san-l te deja koule.

God never moves without purpose or plan
When trying His servant and molding a man
Give thanks to the Lord
Though your testing seems long
In darkness He giveth a song.

O rejoice in the Lord
He makes no mistakes
He knoweth the end of each path that I take
For when I am tried and purified
I shall come forth as gold.

I could not see through the shadows ahead
So I looked at the cross of my Savior instead
I bowed to the will of the Master that day
Then peace cameand tears fled away.

Now I can see testing comes from above
God strengthens His children and purges in love
My father knows best,and I trust in His care
Through purging more fruit I will bear.

Bon Dye pa janm fè anyen san rezon
Lè l’ap teste sèvant li, e ba-l fòm li vle
Rejwi nan Bon Dye , malgre tès yo anpil
Nan fè nwa li pote limyè.

O rejwi nan Bon Dye, li pap fè erè
Li konnen tout chemen
Tout kote mwen pase
Lè-m nan eprèv yo mwen purifye
Mwen va vin tankou lò.

Mwen pa kab wè tenèb bare wout la
Lè sa mwen te gade sou la kwa sovè a
Jou sa m-te soumèt anba ministè li
Li plen kè mwen ak la pè li.

Kounye a m-wè eprèv soti anwo
Bon Dye vle fòtifye la fwa pitit li yo
Papa-m nan syèl la
Konnen sa-k bon pou mwen
Lè-m rele-l e li reponn mwen.

titles.en: SHELTERED IN THE ARMS OF GOD

stanzas.text:
I feel the touch of hands so kind and tender
They’re leading me in paths that I must trod
I have no fear when Jesus walks beside me
For I’m sheltered in the arms of God.

So let the storms rage high, the dark clouds rise
They won’t worry me
For I’m sheltered safe within the arms of God
He walks with me
And naught of earth shall harm me
For I’m sheltered in the arms of God.

Soon I shall hear the call from heaven’s portals
Come home, my child
It’s the last mile you must trod
I’ll fall asleep and wake in God’s new heaven
Sheltered safe within the arms of God.

Mwen santi-m touche men Jezi ki si dous
L’ap kondwi mwen
Nan wout ke-m dwe mache
Mwen pa gen krent le Senyè-m nan bò kote-m
Paske-m refijye-m nan bra Letènèl.

Menm si loraj gronde, vag yo move
Sa pa boulvèse-m
Paske-m refijye-m nan bra Senyè mwen an
L’ap mache avè-m e anyen pa k’atenn mwen
Paske-m refijye-m nan bra Letènèl.

Byento m’va tande yon vwa nan syèl la ki va di :
« Vini pitit mwen se dènye pa-w gen pou-w fè »
Mwen va dòmi e ale nan nouvo syèl la
Paske-m refijye-m nan bra Letènèl.

Someday, someday, I’ll go where Jesus is (3x)
I’ll be caught up to meet him
I’ll be caught up to meet him
I’ll be caught up to meet him in the air
I’ll be caught up to meet him
I’ll be caught up to meet him
Joy and happiness, peace is mine
Someday in glory, I’ll tell the story
Caught up to meet him in the air.

Yon jou, yon jou, m’pral kote Jezi ye
Yon jou, yon jou, m’pral kote Jezi ye
Yon jou, yon jou, m’pral kote Jezi ye
M’ap monte m’pral rankontre-l
M’ap monte m’pral rankontre-l
M’ap monte m’pral rankontre-l anlè a
Map monte m’pral rankontre-l
Map monte m’pral rankontre-l
Jwa a kontantman, pè se pa-m
Yon jou, nan la glwa m’ap bay istwa sa
Monte rankontre-l anlè a

When it seems that you’ve prayed
Til your strength is all gone
And your tears fall like rain drops all the day long
Jesus cares and he knows
Just how much you can bear
He’ll speak your name to someone in prayer.

Someone is praying for you
Jesus is praying for you
And when it seems you’re all alone
And your heart will break in two
Remember someone is praying for you.

Have the clouds ‘round you
Gathered in the midst of a storm
Is your ship tossed and battered
Are you weary and worn
Don’t lose hope
Someone’s praying for you this very day
And peace be still is already on the way.

Lè-w panse ou te priye jis tout fòs ou febli
Dlo nan zye-w kon gout lapli
Tonbe sou tout wout la
Jezi sousye li konnen fado ou kap pote
Li site nom-w bay papa-l nan priyè-l.

Yon moun entèsede pou ou
Jezi ap priye pou ou
E lè-w panse w’te pou kont ou
E kè-w ta vle dechire
Sonje byen Jezi ap priye pou ou.

Eske nyaj antoure-w nan mond ajite sa
Eske w’ap vasiye ou vle pèdi vizyon
Pa pèdi tout espwa
Yon moun ap priye kounye a
Lapè, lajwa, nan wout la jodia.

Precious Lord take my hand
Lead me on, let me stand
I am tired, I am weak, I am worn
Through the storm, through the night
Lead me on through the night
Take my hand precious Lord lead me on

When my way grows drear
Precious Lord linger near
When my life is almost gone
Hear my cry, hear my call
Hold my hand lest I fall
Take my hand, precious Lord
Lead me on.

Chè Senyè, kenbe men m, ede mwen rete fèm
Mwen bouke, m fatige, tèlman.
Nan loraj, nan fènwa, klere wout la devan m ;
Kenbe men m, chè Senyè, fè m rive

Lè chemen m difisil, e m bezwen ou anpil
Senyè, rete la tou pre mwen.
Lè mwen prèt pou ale, ede m pou m pa bite,
Kenbe men m, chè Senyè, fè m rive.

Lè solèy la kouche, e nwit la ap pwoche,
E tout lavi mwen va fini,
Ede m pa gen regrè, nan ou sèl mwen konfye m,
Kenbe men m, chè Senyè, fè m rive.

Often you’ve wondered
Whytears come into your eyes
And burdens seem to be
Much more than you can stand
But God is standing near,He sees your falling tears
Tears are language, God understands.

God sees the tears of a broken hearted soul
He sees your tears and
hears them when they fall
God weeps along with man
And takes him by the hand
Tears are language, God understands.

When grief has left you low
It causes tears to flow
Things have not turned out the way
That you had planned.
But God wont forget you, his promises are true
Tears are language, God understands.

Souvan n’ape mande
Pouki gen dlo nan je?
Chay doulè-n yo sanble two lou pou nou pote
Men Bon Dye tou prè nou
Li wè dlo nan je-n yo
Dlo nan je-n yo s’on langaj
Bon Dye konprann.

Bon Dye wè dlo nan je yon nonm kap soufri
Li wè e-l tande lè yo ape kriye
Bon Dye konn kri kè lòm
Li pase l’ pran men li
Dlo nan je-n yo s’on langaj
Bon Dye konprann.

Lè tristès fin kraze-w
Li kite dlo nan je-w
Tout sa -w tap tann pat fèt jan ou ta espere
Bon Dye pa bliye ou
Pwomès li yo sèten
Dlo nan je-n yo s’on langaj
Bon Dye konprann.

Soon I’ll come to the end of my journey
And I’ll meet the one who gave his life for me
I will thank him for the love that he gave me
And Ten Thousand Years
Or more I’ll reign with him.

Ten Thousand Years we’ll just be started
Ten Thousand Years we’ve just begun
The battle’s over and the victory’s been won
Ten Thousand Years and we’ve just begun.

We will just begin to sing love’s sweet story
It’s a song that the angels cannot sing
’m redeemed by the blood of the Savior
And Ten Thousand Years
Or more I’ll praise his name.

Byento mwen va rive nan kous la
M-va wè sovè-m ki te bay
Lavi-l pou mwen
M’va remèsye-l pou amou li te ban mwen
Di mil ane ou plis
Mwen va renye ak li.

Di mil ane va fèk kòmanse
Di mil ane nan letènite
Batay la fini, an fen se la viktwa
Di mil ane, n’ap renye ak li.

Lè-n va kòmanse chante
Istwa damou sa
Se yon kantik menm zanj yo
Pat kap chante
Ka-n te rachte ak san sovè nou an
Di mil ane ou plis
Mwen va louwe nom li.

Step by step with Jesus
Follow to the end of the way
Heed the voice of God’s ministry
It will lead you to perfection someday.

Paza pa avèk Jezi
Mache jus nan fen wout la
Gade pawòl ministè Bon Dye
L’ap mennen-w nan pèfeksyon yon jou.

I have come here today
Needing something from you
Just one touch is all I ask you for
But here I find your mercy
Sweet love, abounding grace
Thank you Lord, for your presence in this place.

Thank you for your mercy
Thank you for your grace
Thank you for your spirit
I can feel here in this place
Where your people come together
Lifting voices in praise
Thank you Lord for your presence in this place.

It’s so good to be here in this wonderful place
And I know my needs will be supplied
For here I feel your spirit
Your love, abounding grace
Thank you Lord for your presence in this place.

Mwen vini la jodia
Chèch’on bagay de ou
Yon touche se sèl sa mwen bezwen
Men mwen jwenn mizèrikòd ou
Amou ou avèk gras ou
Mèsi Senyè pou prezans ou nan plas sa.

Mèsi pou amou ou
Mèsi pou gras ou
Mèsi pou lespri-w nou ka santi nan plas sa
Kote pèp ou ini ansanm
Leve vwa-l nan louwanj
Mèsi Senyè pou prezans ou nan plas sa.

The blood that Jesus shed for me
Way back on Calvary.
The blood that gives me strength from day to day
It will never lose its power.

It reaches to the highest mountains
It flows to the lowest valleys
The blood that gives me strength from day to day
It will never lose its power.

San ke Jezi te vèse pou mwen
Sou bwa kalvè
San sa li ban mwen fòs jou aprè jou
L’pap janm pèdi pwisans li.

Li monte sou montay ki pi wo a
E li desann nan vale ki pi fon an
San sa li ban mwen fòs jou aprè jou
L’pap janm pèdi pwisans li.

San sa apeze doulè ak krent mwen
E-l seche dlo nan zye-m
San sa li ban mwen fòs jou aprè jou
L’pap janm pèdi pwisans li.

There’s a lighthouse on the hill side
That overlooks life’s sea
When I’m tossed, it sends out a light
That I might see
And the light that shines in darkness
Now will safely lead us over
If it wasn’t for the lighthouse
My ship would be no more.

And I thank God for the lighthouse
I owe my life to him
For Jesus is the lighthouse
And from the rocks of sin
He has shone a light around me
That I could clearly see
If it wasn’t for the lighthouse
tell me, where would this ship be?

Genyen yon fa sou tèt mòn nan
K’ klere limanite
Lè nou pèdi li voye limyè li
Pou nou kapab reprann wout la
E limyè sa kab chase tenèb
Kab mennen-n rive nan la glwa
Si se pat gras a limyè sa
Ki kote-n ta ye ?

E n’ap remèsye-l pou fa
Kap klere lavi nou
Ka Jezi se limyè sa ki sove-n nan peche
Li fè limyè a te briye
Pou nou te kapab wè
Si se pat gras a limyè sa
Ki kote-n ta ye ?

titles.ht: Li Vin Pi Dous Pou Mwen

stanzas.text:
Since I started for the kingdom
Since my life He controls
Since I gave my heart to Jesus
The longer I serve him
The sweeter He grows.

The longer I serve Him, the sweeter He grows
The more I love Him, more love He bestows
Each day is like heaven my heart overflows
The longer I serve Him, the sweeter He grows.

Every need He is supplying
Plenteous grace He bestows
Every day my way gets brighter
The longer I serve Him
The sweeter He grows.

Depi mwen ne nan wayòm nan
Depi lavi m nan men l
Depi m te bay Jezi kè mwen
Li vin pi dous pou mwen
Plis m'ap sèvi l

Li vin pi dous pou mwen, plis m'ap sèvi li
Plis mwen renmen li, se plis li renmen m
Se chak jou kè mwen ap debòde
Li vin pi dous pou mwen, plis m'ap sèvi l

Li satisfè tout bezwen m yo
L'akòde m tout gras li
Li briye plis sou chemen mwen
Li vin pi dous pou mwen
Plis m'ap sèvi l

The most wonderful thing
That ever happened to me
When he led me this way
He gave me eyes to see
It’s more precious than gold
It’s a pearl of great price
When he added me to the Body of Christ.

Gon bagay mèveye ki pat jamè rive   
Lè-l kondwi-m nan wout sa l-ouvri zye-m pou-m wè 
Li pli presye ke lò se yon pèl de gran pri 
Lè-l te ajoute mwen nan le kò de Kris

Why you worry about tomorrow
About the things you don’t understand
If you are living your life for Jesus
He’ll reveal the rest of his plan

Oh, the next step we take
May lead us into perfection
The next move we make
May be the greatest move of all
And the next voice we hear could be Jesus
So look up now we are touching
A part of his throne.

We are living a new dispensation
The time of perfection is near
We must strive, lawfully, for the Master
If the voice of the lamb we will hear.

Be strong and keep on going
Don’t be angry when things are going wrong
Don’t give up for it’s almost over
All signs are pointing towards home.

Soon now our Lord will be coming
In raiement much whiter than snow
Prepare your hearts for his coming
And with Jesus you surely will go.

Pouki-w bat kò-w pou sa kap vin demen
Pou tout bagay ke nou pa kab konprann
Si n’ap viv chak jou pou-n peye pri a
Li va revele nou rès plan li.

Lòt pa nou va fè
Ap mennen nou nan pèfeksyon
Lòt revèy Bon Dye
Va pi gran ke tout sa-k avan
E lòt vwa va pale, se vwa Jezi
An nou veye n’ap touche
Ke wòb le Senyè.

N’ap antre nan w’nouvèl dispansasyon
Tan pèfeksyon an fin rive sou nou
Si-n lite selon règ pou-n gen pri a
Si nou koute Senyè lanyo a.

Fò-n fè efò fò-n kriye an avan
Fò-n pa fache lè bagay yo mache mal
Pa lage ka lè lit yo ap vini
Tout siy yo va montre nou lakay.

Byento le senyè nou prale vini
Nan yon vètman ki pi blan ke la nèj
Prepare kè nou pou lè-l retounen
E ak Jezi siman n’va ale.
L303- LOUVRI KÈ-W BAY LE SENYÈ

On a hill far away
Stood and old rugged cross
The emblem of suffering and shame
And I love that old cross
Where the dearest and best
For a world of lost sinners was slain.

So I’ll cherish the old rugged cross
Til my trophies at last I lay down
I will cling to the old rugged cross
And exchange it someday for a crown.

To the old rugged cross
I will ever be true
It’s shame and reproach gladly bear
And he’ll call me someday
To my home far away
Where is glory forever I’ll share.

Se sou mòn Gòlgota,
Yo te plante yon kwa,
Kote brigan te gen pou mouri,
Men se sou menm kwa sa a,
Kris te mouri pou mwen,
Pou m kapab pataje tout glwa li.

Yo te klouwe Jezi sou lakwa;
E se la li te mouri pou mwen.
M ape viv nan glwa Li sou tè sa a
E yon jou m ava wè Li nan syèl.

Pou tout sa k te rive,
Sou lakwa nan jou sa a,
Mwen va toujou gen rekonesans;
Paske sa Jezi fè,
Li te fè l nan plas mwen,
Pou ban mwen lavi an abondans.

Kon yo touye Jezi
Ki se pitit Bondye,
Yo pa vle wè kretyen yo nonplis;
Men mwen pito swiv Li
Nan tout sa k ap rive,
Pase tout sa m ka jwenn sou tè sa a.

The windows of heaven are open
God’s power is falling tonight
There’s joy, joy, joy in my soul
Since Jesus made everything right
I gave him my old tattered garment
He’ll give me a robe of pure white
I’m feasting on the manna from heaven
And that’s why I am happy tonight.

Pòt syèl la louvri
Benediksyon Bon Dye pral tonbe
Gen jwa, jwa, jwa nan kè mwen
Depi Jezi fè tout bagay byen
Li te lave tout rad sal mwen yo
Li ban mwen yon wòb blan e pi
M’ap manje la mànn ki sot nan syèl la
Se sak fè kè-m kontan jodia.

When my soul was disturbed with sorrow
When my heart was burdened with sin
Jesus opened his arms of mercy
And tenderly took me in.

There is peace in the time of trouble
There is peace in the midst of the storm
There is peace tho the world be raging
In the shelter of his arms.
Tho the world all around be raging
And it’s filled with many alarms
Trust in Jesus and He will keep you
In the shelter of his arms.

Nanm mwen te boulvèse ak soufrans
Lè kè-m te chaje
Jezi nan mizèrikòd li
Te ban-m refij nan bra li.

Gen la pè nan mitan tèt chaje
Gen la pè nan mitan gwo tanpèt
Gen la pè malgre le mond pran chèn
Gen la pè nan bra li yo.

Tanpèt sa yo ke nou ap fè fas
Pa ebranle-n yo pa kab fè-n mal
Le Senyè va ba ou pwoteksyon
Nan refuj anba nom li.

Malgre tout le mond nan boulvès
Ranpli avèk bri toupatou
Konfye-w nan Jezi li va kenbe-w
Nan refij nan bra li yo.

titles.ht: Va gen chan ak anpil kri

stanzas.text:
There’ll be singing, there’ll be shouting
when the saints go marching home
In Jerusalem in Jerusalem
Singing psalms and loud hosannas
When the king shall take his throne
In the new Jerusalem.

Va gen chan ak anpil kri lè sen yo prale lakay
Nan jeruzalèm, nan jeruzalèm 
Chante sòm kriye ozana lè rwa nou va kourone
Nan nouvèl jeruzalèm

There’s a river of life flowing down from me
It caused the lame to walk and the blind to see
It opens prison doors, sets the captive free
There’s a river of life flowing down from me.

G’on rivyè dlo lavi
Kap koule nan nanm mwen
Li fè bwate mache, louvri zye avèg
Li louvri pòt prizon, lage kaptif yo
G’on rivyè dlo lavi
Kap koule nan nanm mwen.

This is the way the Lord shows me to go
This is the way that satisfies my soul
So I’ll stay around a while
And become as a little child
This the way the Lord shows me to go.

Se chemen sa le Senyè montre mwen
Se chemen sa ki satisfè nanm mwen
Donk m’ap rete nan wout sa
Pou-m vin k’on yon timoun piti
Se chemen sa
Le Senyè montre mwen.

In the dark of the midnight have I oft hid my face
while the storm howls above me
And there’s no hiding place
Mid the crash of the thunder
Precious Lord hear my cry.
Keep me safe till the storm passes by.

Till the storm passes over
Till the thunder sounds no more
Till the clouds roll forever from the sky
Hold me fast, let me stand
In the hollow of thy hand
Keep me safe till the storm passes by.

Many times satan whispers
There is no need to try
For there’s no end of sorrow
There’s no hope by and by
But I know you are with me and tomorrow I’ll rise
Where the storms never darken the skies.

When the long night has ended
And the storms come no more
Let me stand in thy presence
On that bright peaceful shore
In that land where the tempest never comes
Lord may I dwell with thee
Till the storms passes by.

Nan mitan tenèb minwi anpil fwa m’vle kache
Pandan tanpèt anvayi pyès kote pou-m kache
Nan mitan bri loraj yo Senyè koute priyè-m
Kache mwen jis tanpèt la pase.

Jis tanpèt la fin pase
Jis loraj yo fin gwonde
Jis nyaj yo fin disparèt nan syèl la
Kenbe men-m fè-m rive
Nan pla men ou , O Senyè
Kenbe-m fò jis tanpèt la pase.

Anpil fwa satan di-m pa bezwen menm eseye
Tristès mwen pap janm gen fen
Pa gen espwa pou mwen
Men-m konnen ou avèk mwen
E demen m’va leve
kote ke tan pap jamè mare.

Lè nwit long nan fin pase, tanpèt pa vin ankò
Fè-m nan prezans kote limyè ou ap klere
Sou tè kote tanpèt pap janm vin ankò Senyè
Kote loraj pap kapab gwonde.

Toucm again Lord, touch me again
Fill up the empty place, that troubles my soul
Let your spirit wash over me
Give me words of praise
So that I might let you know
That I’ll ever love you.

Touche mwen Senyè touche-m ankò
Ranpli fon nan-m mwen m-santi-m boulvèse
Kite lespri-w repan-n sou mwen ban-m pawòl lwanj
Pou-m kapab fè ou konnen
Ke map toujou renmen ou

We worship you in honor and in glory
We worship you because we love you
We worship you and lift our voice to praise you

titles.ht: Ki Gran Jou Sa Va Ye

stanzas.text:
There’s coming a day
When no heart aches shall come
No more clouds in the sky
No more tears to dim the eye
All is peace forever more
On that happy golden shore
What a day, glorious day that will be.

What a day that will be
When my Jesus I shall see
And I look upon his face
The one who save me by his grace
When he take me by the hand
And leads me through the promise land
What a day, glorious dad that will be.

There’ll be no sorrow there
No more burdens to bear
No more sickness, no pain
No more parting over there
And for ever I will be
With the one who died for me
What a day, glorious day that will be.

Gen yon jou k ap vini,
Jou sa a p ap genyen chagren
P ap gen nyaj nan syel la,
Ni gwo dlo pou twouble je m
Va gen lapè pou toutan,
Nan bèl ti vil dò sa a
ki gran jou, jou gloriye sa va ye!

Ki gran jou sa va ye,
Le m a rakontre Jezi
E mwen va gade figi l,
Li menm ki sove m pa gras
E li va kenbe men mwen.
Poul mennen m nan tè pwomès la
Ki gran jou, jou gloriye sa va ye!

P ap genyen tristès,
Ni fado pou nou pote,
Ni maladi, ni doulè,
Ni pataj nan peyi sa a.
Va gen lapè pou toutan
Nan bèl ti vil dò sa a.
Ki gran jou, jou gloriye sa va ye!

Ou men m ki san Jezi,
sa ou va fè nan jou sa a?
Men Jezi pral vini,
Pòt lagras la pral fèmen
Kòlè Bondye pral tonbe
Sou tout moun ki san Jezi.
Ki gran jou, jou gloriye sa va ye!

What God can do, what God can do
Eyes have not seen, ears have not heard
What God can do
He’s mighty in grace, and strong in power
Eyes have not seen, ears have not heard
What God can do.

Sa Dye ka fè, sa Dye ka fè
Zye pa kab wè, zòrèy pa tande
Sa Dye ka fè
Li pwisan nan gras, li fò e-l pwisan
Zye pa kab wè, zòrèy pa tande
Sa Dye ka fè.

There’s a voice calling me from an old rugged tree
And it whispers, draw closer to me
Leave this world far behind
There are new heights to climb
And a new place in Me you will find.

For whatever it takes
To draw closer to you, Lord
That’s what I’ll be willing to do
For whatever it takes
To be more like you
That’s what I’ll be willing to do.

Take the dearest things to me
If that’s how it must be
To draw me closer to thee
Let the disappointments come
Lonely days without the sun
If through sorrow more like You I’ll become.

Take my houses and lands
Change my dreams and my plans
For I’m placing my whole life in your hand
And if you call me today
To a land far away Lord
I’ll go and your will obey.

Gen yon vwa kap rele-m
ki soti bò la kwa

Nenpòt ki sa-l mande
Pou-m vin pi prè Senyè-m nan
Mwen va deja prè pou-m fè li

Pou-m sanble ak ou

Pran sa ki chè pou mwen
Si se sa ou mande
Mwen lage tout bagay nan men ou

Mwen va fè-l e mwen va obeyi.

When I think of how he came so far from glory
Came and dwell among the lowly such as I
To suffer shame and such disgrace
On mount Calvary take my place
It’s then I ask myself this question
Who am I?

Who am I that a King would bleed and die for?
Who am I that He would pray :
“not my will thine for”
The answer I may never know
Why He ever loved me so
That to an old rugged cross he’d go for
Who am I?

When I’m reminded of his words
“I’ll leave thee never, just be true
I’ll give to you a life forever”
I wonder what I could have done
To deserve God’s only Son
To fight my battles till they’re won
Who am I?

Ou toujou fè gwo mirak

your grace and mercy have brought me through.

You’ve got to move.

N’ap avanse, n’ap avanse

Inward parts

titles.ht: Lè-m sonje kote mwen te ye

stanzas.text:
Nan fòs la kote-w te jwenn mwen
Sòti byen fon nan fòs Senyè
Konnen m-te lwen
Yon bagay mwen byen asire
Mwen ret yon long wout pou-m ale
Avan m’atenn plas sa a m’ap chèche
Nan ou Senyè.

Gen yon plas Senyè m’ap chèche nan ou
Se pi gran richès mwen kapab jwenn
Nan tout lavi mwen
Kelke swa sa va koute pou mwen peye pri a
Men se tout dezi mwen pou-m atenn
Plas sa nan ou.

Gen anpil montay pou-m monte
Avan mwen resi jwenn plas sa
E mwen sûr gen anpil eprèv pou-m travèse
Men chak tès mwen va pase
Va fè-m plis sanble ak Jezi
Ede-m nan tout dezi mwen pou-m atenn
Plas sa nan ou.

Chak jou lè solèy la leve
Fè-m toujou sonje priye
Pou-m ka jwenn pafèt volonte-w
Nan tout sa m’ap fè
Di mwen ki kote pou-m ale
E semans ou ban-m pou-m seme
Ka se tout dezi mwen pou-m atenn
Plas sa nan ou.

When I think of where i've been
And the pit you found me in
Iv'e come a long, long way
Dear Lord, I know it's true
But one thing, I surely know
I have along way yet to go
Before I reach that place
I'm longing for in Thee

There's a place Lord, 
I'm longing for in Thee
And to find this place means 
all the world to me
'Twill be worth anything 
you put me through
Just to reach that place 
I'm longing for in you

At the drawing of each day
Let me look to you and pray
For your perfect will in everything I do
Tell me when and where to go
And the seed you'd have me sow
That I may reach that place I'm longing for in You

There are mountains yet to climb
Before this place, in You I'll find
And I'm sure that many trial I'll go through
But each test I overcome
Will make more like your dear son
And help me reach that place 
I'm longing for in You

Many times I’m tried and tested
As I travel day by day.
‘Oft I meet with pain and sorrow
And there’s trouble in the way.
But I have a sweet assurance
That my soul, the Lord will lead.
And in Him there is strength 
for every need.
ke
Oh, His grace is sufficient for me.
And His love is abundant and free.
And what joy fills my soul,
Just to know, just to know
That His grace is sufficient for me

When the tempter brings confusion
And I don’t know what to do,
On my knees I turn to Jesus
For He’ll always see me through.
Then despair is changed to victory.
Every doubt just melts away
And in Him there is hope 
for everyday.

met lavi ou nan menl 
aksepte volonte l
kite Dieu Kite Dieu kondwi ou

titles.en: I’m glad I’m serving a God

stanzas.text:
who’s able to deliver
I’m glad I ‘m serving a God 
Who’s able to defend
I’m glad I‘m serving a God 
who hears me when I’m praying, 
I’m glad I’m serving a God 
on whom I can depend

M’kontan m’ap sèvi yon Dye
Ki kapab delivre mwen
M’kontan m’ap sèvi yon Dye
Ki kapab defann mwen
M kontan m’ap sèvi yon Dye
Ki tande mwen lè-m priye
M’kontan m’ap sèvi yon Dye
Mwen ka depann de li.

titles.en: Why don't you lift up your hands

stanzas.text:
Why don't you lift up your hands and praise The Lord 
Thank God for His mercy 
And Thank God for His love 
Great is The Lord
He's greatly to be praised 
Lift up your hands and praise The Lord.

Pouki w’pa leve men-w louwe le Senyè
Louwe-l pou amou li, pou mizèrikòd li
Le Senyè gran li merite louwanj
Leve men-w louwe le Senyè.

Si w te ka we kotem te ye
Si-w ka ale ak mwen 
Deye kote ke mwen te ye 
Ou te ka konstate
Gran mirak damou 
Ki mennenm mwen nan si bel plas sa
ki fe mwen sa mye jodi a
Yon peche k’sove pa gras

Mwen se yon peche ki sove pa gras
m-te kondane poum mouri
lte pran plas mwen 
kounya mgrandi nan libete 
el met souf lavil nan mwen
amou-l ak padon’l te ban mwen lavi
yon peche ki sove pa gras

Koman-m ka fe vante tet mwen
Pou sa-m pat fe ni we
Koman-m ka reklame pou pa-m
viktwa Bondieu genyen
Ki kote mwen ta ye 
si Bondieu pat mennenm nan plas sa 
map diw mwen pa anyen
M –selman yon peche sove pa gras

If you could see what I once was
If you could go with me
Back to where I started from
Then I know you would see
A miracle of love that took me
In it's sweet embrace
And made me what I am today
 An old sinner saved by grace

I'm just a sinner saved by grace
When I stood condemned to death
He took my place
Now I live and breathe in freedom
With each breath of life I take
Loved and forgiven, backed with a living
I'm just a sinner saved by grace

How could I boast of anything
I've ever seen or done?
How could I dare to claim as mine
The victories God has won?
Where would I be had God not brought me
Gently to this place?
I'm here to say I'm nothing
But a sinner saved by grace

titles.en: Hold my hand all the way

stanzas.text:
Once I stood in the night
With my head bowed low
In the darkness
as black as could be
And my heart felt alone
and I cried, "Oh Lord
Don't hide your face from me"
ke
Hold my hand all the way,
every hour, every day
Come here to the great
unknown
Take my hand, let me stand
Where no-one stands alone

Like a king, I may live
in a palace so tall
With great riches to call my own
But I don't know a thing
In this whole wide world
That's worse than being alone

Nan nwit la m-te kanpe
ak tèt mwen koube
Lonbray tenèb te kouvri mwen
Nan kè m-te santi sèl M-te rele
o Senyè pa kache-m fas ou

Kenbe men-m jisko bou a chak e
chake jou Kounye a
juska lafen
Pran men mwen
fè-m kanpe
Kote mwen pa jan-m sèl

Kò-m yon rwa m-te kab viv
nan-w palè byen wo
Ak gran richès ke mwen posede
M-pa konnen yon bagay
nan le mon-n antye
ki pi tris lem rete sel

Nan traka m yo nan traka’m yo
map aprann kwe nan Jesus
map aprann kwe nan Bondieu
nan traka’m yo nan traka’m yo
map aprann depann mwen
nan parol li

Through it all through Through it all
I’ve learned to trust in Jesus
l’ve learned to trust in God
through it all through it all
I’ve learned to depend upon his word

Si’m mouri nan volonte’m
mwen m’va viv mwen vin lib
le’m te renmen’n tout bon
Le’m t’aprann bay le Seye
m’te resevwa
E le m’te umilye mwen
li leve mwen

Mwen peswade m’deja peswade
anyen pap separe mwen ak ou
vye mond sa vle mare mwen
men mwen renmen
la pe m’te jwen
mwen fixe pansem
anyen pap separe mwen ak ou

I am persuaded, I am persuaded
Nothing shall separate me from God
This old world would have me bound
But I love this peace I’ve found
I’ve made up my mind
Nothing shall separate me from God

Mwen rekonesan zye-m yo ka wè
E yon kè ki ka konprann
Mwen rekonesan pou verite
E chans ke-m gen pou-m sèvi Bon Dye
Mwen gen yon vizyon
Pou-m kontinye avanse jou aprè jou
Mwen vle mache nan chemen jus e dwat.

Se yon bèl vi le Senyè te ban mwen
Mwen pa gen pou-m sèvi le mond ankò
Mwen gen fanmi ki renmen-m
E yon Dye ki pap janm fayi
O m’ louwe nom li
Mwen vle tout lavi-m pou Bon Dye.

Bon Dye nan mizèrikòd li
E nan amou li, l’te ban-n sali
Se gras a pouvwa-l e sajès li
Ke-n genyen revelasyon plan
A tout sa yo ke li chwazi
E k’ap travay n’on sèl akò
Li va ba yo la glwa lavi etènèl.

It was God’s mercy and his great love
that brought salvation down to man
it was his kingdom and his power
that did reveal God’s mighty plan
to all that chosen of the Lord
And those who work in one accord
Eternal life and joy will be their
reward.
ke
It’s a good life
The Lord has giving me
I don’t have to serve
this world anymore
I have a family who cares
And a Lord who never fails
Oh Praise his name
I want to live my life for him

Le mond va eseye satisfè
Dezi sa w’gen nan nanm ou
Ou kap pèdi tan-w anven rete ap chèhe toupatou
Ou pap janm jwenn vrè satisfaksyon
Jiskaske-w jwenn le Senyè
Ka sèlman Jezi ka satisfè nanm ou.

Satisfè nanm ou
Sèlman Jezi ka satisfè nanm ou
E li menm sèl ka chanje vi-w e fè-w vin pwòp
L’ap ba-w lapè , w’pat posede
Lamou, lajwa, ak le syèl tou
Ka sèlman Jezi ka satisfè nanm ou.

Menm si ou ta rive posede
Renome, fòtin, richès
Men si-w pa gen Kris nan vi-w
Lavi-w isi ba ta anven
Lè lè a va rive pou-w mouri
Richès ou yo pap ede-w
Ka sèlman Jezi ka satisfè nanm ou.

The world will try to satisfy that longing in your soul,
You may search the wide world over but you'll be just as before.
You'll never find true satisfaction until you've found the Lord,
For only Jesus can satisfy your soul.

Only Jesus can satisfy your soul
And only He can change your heart
And make you whole;
He'll give you peace you never knew
Sweet love and joy and Heaven too,
For only Jesus can satisfy your soul.

If you could have the fame and fortune all the wealth you could obtain,
Yet you have not Christ within your living here would be in vain;
There'll come a time when death shall call you, riches can not help you then,
So some to Jesus for He can satisfy.

I’m not trying to find just a new frame of mind
That would change my whole point of view
See I’ve been thru it all deep inside
Nothing changed I’m not new
I’m not seeking a gift of emotional lift
But one thing I’m longing to do
Is to lift up my cup
And let you fill it up with just you.

More of you, more of you
I’ve got all but what I need, is just more of you
Of things I’ve had my fill
And yet I’m hunger still empty and bare
Lord hear my prayer for more of you.

Mwen p'ap cheche nouvel fason panse
Ki ta chanje tout opinyon mwen
Malgre m reyalize m pa kapab chanje anyen mwen menm
Mwen p'ap cheche yon don ni yon emosyon nouvel
Sel bagay mwen vreman vle se pou m leve koup mwen
Kite l ranpli li ak tout li menm

Plis nan ou
Plis nan ou
Nan tout sa m gen bezwen
Fè m plis nan ou
Pou sa m genyen deja
Jiska prezan m grangou
Mwen di Segnè: "Koute kri kè m
fè m plis nan ou"

titles.en: MY TRUST IS RESTED ON JESUS

stanzas.text:
My trust is rested on Jesus 
who has all power He will never fail 
when the storms are raging high
And he’s on the throne 
making intercession for me
His mighty spirit falls on me, so he’s alive.

My trust is rested on Jesus
Altough I see him not
But by faith I hear the bells ring 
in the holy of holies
For this man was counted worthy
Of having more glory than Moses
He entered into the holiest by his own blood.

M'ap aprann konfye m nan Jezi ki gen tout puisans
Li pa janm fayi nan moman difisil yo
Li se yon avoka sou twòn nan k'ap plede pou nou
Puisans Lespri li fè m santi ke li vivan

M'ap met tout konfyans mwen nan li
Menm si zye m pa wè l
Pa la fwa m tande son klòch yo
K'ap sonnen nan sen dè sen
Yon sakrifikatè si gran
L depase ministè Moyiz la
Asanswa l nan men l
Li se yon vainqueur de la mort

SE LEGLIZ SA , SE LÈ AK RIVE
SOVÈ AP VINI POUL BA NOU PWISANS
LAP VINI NAN KÈ NOU POUL RETE
ALA YON MÈVEYE, GLORIYE JOU

This is the church, this is the hour
Our Lord is coming to give us power
He’s coming in our hearts to stay
Oh what a wonderful, glorious day.

Pito-m soufri m’peye pri a
Pito-m tounu m’peye pri a
Sa-k rezève pou mwen demen
M’pa ka konte
Apot yo te peye pri a
Ansyen yo te peye pri a
E kounye a yo sou lotèl la
Y’ap tann mwen.

Yon jou mwen te nan yon wout pèdi
Kè mwen te pèdi tout gran jwa
Tout bèl chan
Men gras li please mwen kote mwen dwe ye
E pitye l reekri vi m

Pitye l reekri vi m
Pitye l reekri vi mwen
Mwen te ka tonbe
Nanm mwen ta pèdi
Men pitye l reekri vi m

Erè m yo te tounen tank'on mirak
Tristès mwen yo te chanje an jwa
Peche m yo padone
Yon lòt non reekri
Lè pitye te reekri vi m

For years I traveled a road all wrong
My heart had lost its joy and its song
Till grace placed me right where I belong
When mercy rewrote my life.

Mercy rewrote my life
Mercy rewrote my life
I could have fallen
My soul cast way down
But mercy rewrote my life.

My mistakes God turned into miracles
And all of my tears he turned into joy
Then my past was forgiven
And my new name it was written
When mercy rewrote my life.

Plis ke jamè avan, Senyè m’bezwen-w
Plis ke jamè avan, Senyè m’renmen-w
Pius ke jamè avan, Senyè m’vle di ou
M’bezwen-w kounye a
Plis ke jamè avan.

titles.ht: PLIS OU METE LÒD NAN VI-W

stanzas.text:
Lè ou va rasanble-w, lè ou òganize-w
Lè-w mete lòd nan vi ou
Lè ou va wè Bon Dye
Lè ou va sispann fè tèt ou plezi
Pa kite mechanste plen kè ou frè mwen
Kris vle sèl wa nan vi ou
Pa janm sere tèt ou, pou-w pase sou lòd yo
Se yon gras Bon Dye ba ou.

Plis ou mete lòd nan vi-w
Ou va viv ere
Plis ou genyen konesans
Ou va konn sa pou-w fè
Bon Dye s’on Bon Dye lumyè
Li pa gen tenèb nan li
Li toujou fidèl, li toujou pi gran
Li pap janm fayi, inebranlab.

Sispann bati tèt ou, vi-w s’on vanite
Sa-k bati sou sab pap kab reziste
Lè gwo van va soufle, lè gwo dlo va desann
Kanpe sou woche a
Ann remèsye Bon Dye ki nan syèl la
Nan eprèv yo li plen-n ak lespri-l
Ann chanje sa-n ka chanje
Sipòte sa-n pa kapab chanje
Avèk pèsistans nou va rive

Pou ki lonè, pou ki la glwa
Pou ki twòn yo ki nan syèl la
Se pou moun ki mennen yon vi
Yon vi sanktifye pou le Senyè.

titles.ht: POU SA-W FE POU MWEN YO

stanzas.text:
Kris te desann byen ba
Pou-l retire yon moun tankou-m
Nan fè nwa kote mwen te ye
Pou-l plase-m nan kò li
Pat gen espwa lavi pou mwen
Men kounye a m’ap avanse pou lavi etènèl.

Pou sa-w fè pou mwen yo
M’ap leve vwa mwen pou-m louwe-w
Pou tout ane k’pase yo
Ou te pwoteje mwen Senyè
Pou jan-w te batay
Pou-m te kab nan plas sa toujou
Louwanj mwen yo twò piti
Pou-m montre-w jan mwen rekonesan
Se ak yon kè ki enb
M’ap di-w mèsi Senyè.

M’Kontan Kris te chwazi 
yon moun ko’m mwen pou’m sevi li
Si li pat fe sa pou mwen 
Mwen tap byen lwen nan labou
M’rejwi m’te jwen gras nan zye’l
Se pou sa map pran tout tan mwen 
Pou mwen louwe li

Pou yon kè pi toujou
Yon lespri jis kon ou
Yon fwa ki fèm chak jou, se dezi mwen
Pou-m leve men-w ki sen
Volonte ou sèten
Fè sa-w kòmande mwen, se dezi mwen.

Pouki m’dwe fè fayit devan nenpòt ki bagay
Pouki pou-m efreye lè-m tande gwo bri
Si-m te revele pou-m sòti nan vale a
Mwen mèt mache san krent
Kris ap gide mwen.

Mwen pa genyen anyen ki pou ebranle mwen
Se vre m’konnen gen gran siklòn ak tanpèt dèyè a
Gen gwo loraj gen anpil bagay kap pare tann
mwen
Tout fwa ak Kris sovè a mwen va rive.

Se lè pou-n manje anyo avèk zèb amè tou
Malgre sa pa fasil fòk nou pran kwa nou
Gen kèk bagay nan nou ki bezwen transfòme
Kout ke kout si-n dwe pafè
Fòk nou graje.

Pouki-w pa kwè li, di-m pouki sa ?
Li tèlman renmen-w, l’mouri pou ou
Li fè ou pwomès, pawòl li vrè
Si-w kite-l aji, l’ap beni ou.

titles.ht: POUKI-W PA POTE FADO-W YO BA LI

stanzas.text:
Mwen santi-m kontan
Lè mwen pral lakay Bon Dye
Lè sa m’pot sousi, bezwen-m yo ba li
Li pran yo pou mwen
Pou-m kap jwenn soulajman
Ranpli-m ak fòs
Pou-m mache sou wout la.

Pouki-w pa pote fado-w yo ba li
Bon Dye kap ede-w
L’ap pran swen bezwen-w yo
Konfye-w nan li, w’a wè fidelite-l
Avèk la fwa
W’a konn grandè Bon Dye.

Nanm nou jwenn lavi
Lè nou nan tanp le Senyè
Wi anpil rejwisans, avèk libète
Wi nou santi-n kontan
Lè-n nan prezans Bon Dye
Nanm nou rejwi
Santi-n prèt pou-n avanse.

Kite-m sispann fè rezistans jodia
Depouye mwen konplètman e priye
Manifeste amou youn pou lòt
Nan ede bati frè mwen an
M’va yon kolòn nan mezon le Senyè.

Pou-m vin yon kolòn nan mezon le Senyè
Ki gran onè sa ta ye nan vi mwen
Si-m kontinye mache dwat
Ret fidèl jiskaske-m pafè
M’va yon kolòn
Nan mezon le Senyè.

Nan wayòm ou yon jou mwen va ye
San enkyetid sou sa lavi ka pote
Mwen va travay nan lòd ou
Nan ede bati grenye a
M’va yon kolòn nan mezon le Senyè.

Let me lay down my strife today
Give all that I have and pray
show love t’ward another
And help build my brother
I’ll be a pillar in the house of the Lord.

To be a pillar in the house of the Lord
What an honor this life could bring
If I’ll walk up rightly, be faithfull til’ I’m holy
I’ll be a pillar in the house of the Lord.

In your kingdom I long to be
Not caring what life may bring
I’ll work in your order and help build the garner
And be a pillar in the house of the Lord.

Pou sa n’ap gade ak zye nou
N’ap tande ak de zòrèy nou
Nou kapab di gran jou Senyè a rive
Se pa lè pou nou ap dòmi
Nan mitan legliz Bon Dye a
Nou ta dwe kòmanse fè sa-n pat konn fè.

Pral gen kriye, pral gen rele
Pral gen manje dan toupatou sou latè
Pral gen kriye, pral gen rele
Pap gen kote pou lèzòm al kache.

Va gen kriye nan "night club yo"
Va gen rèl nan sinema yo
Nan plas piblik yo pral genyen doulè
Pandan yo nan tout plezi yo
Y’ap antrene nan peche yo
Se lè sa twonpèt la pral sone.

Va gen kriye nan fanmi yo
Va gen rele sou gran ri yo
Nan faktori yo pral gen etònman
Nan izin yo pral gen la pèn
Nan magazen pral gen tristès
Nan plaj yo pral genyen dlo nan zye.

Jou Jezi-Kris va vini an
Se yon gran jou ki va tèrib
Ranje pye-w paske pral gen triyaj
L’ap vini pou-l vannen legliz
Tout sa-k pa bon pral devwale
Tout pay yo pral brile nan dife.

Bon Dye te pwomèt Abraham
Pou li beni pwosterite li
Men-l pat rive akonpli pwomès la tou swit
Abraham père de la fwa
Malgre eprèv l’pat dekouraje
Si-w kenbe fèm nan eprèv yo
Lap louvr’on pòt pou ou.

Bon Dye Abraham nan
Se li menm ki Bon Dye-m jodia
Menm Bon Dye Moyiz la
Se li menm ki Bon Dye-m jodia
Pa gen sikontans ki kab ebranle nonm sa
Pa genyen anyen non anyen
Dye-m nan pa kab fè.

Li te fann lamè wouj an de
Pèp izrayèl te pase
Li te delivre Danyèl nan fòs lyon an
Li se menm Dye k’te la yè a
E li pap jamè chanje
Pwoblèm ou yo pa tèlman difisil
Pou-l pa delivre-w.

Pawòl ki sot nan bouch li
Pa janm al jwenn li san-l pa akonpli
Lè-l pwomèt pou li beni-w kwè-w deja beni
Si-w met konfyans ou nan li
Li pap janmè kite-w soti wont
Lè-l fè pi nwa konnen delivrans ou pa two lwen.

Senyè nou vin nan mezon-w
Pafwa n’fèb san espwa
Men nou genyen esperans
Ke n’ap rankontre avè-w
Lè nou fèb, ou vin fò
Senyè-n vin devan twònn ou
Tande kri-n, ka n’konnen ke nou pa sèl.

Ranpli tanp la Senyè
Avèk lespri ou
Voye lapli-w pou lave nou
Pandan-w nan mitan nou
Ranpli-n ak pwisans pouvwa-w
Plen plas sa, ranpli kè-n
Nan moman sa.

Ba nou gras chake jou
Kenbe-n pou-n pa chite
Lè-n tonbe ou toujou la
Tout fado-n yo ou pote
Lè nou fèb, ou vin fò
Senyè-n vin devan twònn ou
Tande kri-n, ka n’konnen ke nou pa sèl.

Senyè-n remèsye ou
W’te fè-n kite lejip
Kounye a n’nan wout pou kanaan
N’pa vle fè tankou Kore, Datan e Abiram
Paske n’vle toujou nan plan ou.

Rebati panse-n yo
Pou-n viv pou ou menm sèl
Ede-n pou-n retire nan nou
Tout vye espri ejipsyen yo
Ede-n an plis pou-n kap wè
Limyè solèy la kape klere
Jis nou rive kanaan.

Ou te fè-n kite lejip
Pa pou-n mouri nan dezè
Ni pou sèpan brilan te mòde-n
Men-w te fè-n kite zòn sa
Paske-w g’on plan pou nou
N’pa vle meprize kòmandman-w yo.

W’te pwomèt w’ap avèk nou
Jiskan-n fin fè wout la
Paske ou se yon Bon Dye fidèl
W’pap janm bliye pwomès ou
E anyen pap chanje
Ede-n pou-n kap rive nan wout sa.

M’ap louwe-l pou fòs ak grandè li
M’ap beni-l pou nom li ki pi wo
Se chak jou mwen vle pou louwanj li
Nan bouch mwen
M’ap chante, louwe, egzalte.

Resevwa aksyon de gras kè mwen Senyè
Aksepte ofrand ke m’ap ofri ba ou
M’ap louwe-w, se pa paske tout bagay yo byen
M’ap chante li bon pou mwen.

Senyè-w konnen m’te egare
M’pat kab wè
Panse-m yo te chaje avèk dout, konfizyon
M’tap mache nan pwòp direksyon-m
Ki pat bon
Senyè pran men-m, e dirije-m, kote-w vle-m ye.

Restore nanm mwen nan vale a
Pou mwen kap vin jis pou-m kabab
Kanpe ak ou sou tèt montay siyon an
Nan vale a Restore nanm mwen.

M’vin devan-w
Aprè-m fin kite richès mwen yo
Mwen vin jwenn ou
Byen ke-m pat anyen nan zye ou
Senyè m’ap mande-w pou touche-m
Avèk men-w
K’te klouwe pou mwen e fè mwen sa ou vle.

Rete nan dife a, li va pirifye-w
Li va netwaye-w, l’ap fè-w vin pwòp
Li pape brile-w si ou mache ladan-l
Li va brile kòd yo, pay yo va disparèt
E-l va fè ou vin pi tankou lò.

Fè de mwen sa ou vle
San ou mwen pa anyen
Transfòme-m e chanje-m
Kenbe-m pi prè ou
Ka nan ou pa gen defèt
Se viktwa nèt ale
Se sou ou mwen konte
Dirije-m jan ou vle.

Retire tout sa-k pa bon nan mwen
Mwen vle viv pou ou menm sèl
Retire tout sa-k pa bon nan mwen
Kenbe-m pi prè ou
Se ou menm ki tout lavi mwen
San ou Senyè sa mwen tap fè
Retire tout sa-k pa bon nan mwen
Mwen vle viv pou ou menm sèl.

Sa ou vle Senyè se sa mwen va fè
Se pa paske mwen vle Senyè
Men se volonte-w
Volonte-w nan mwen Senyè
Pou-m atenn bi a
Fè-m rete nan plas sa
Pou-m atenn pèfeksyon.

Sa se yon pwisans ki desann sot nan syèl
Li tresayi nanm mwen
Mwen pa kap achte’l ak lajan mond sa
Li pi presye pase lò ki pi fen an
Kounye a-m jwen li
Mwen pa kapab doute-l
Li tresayi nanm mwen
Lape debòde pi plis e plis
Sentespri Bon Dye a.

Sa-l fè pou mwen, mwen pa kapab konte
Remèsiman mwen yo, twò piti pou li
Louwanj mwen yo, twò piti pou li
Li pi presye pase dyaman
Louwanj mwen yo, twò piti pou li.

Santi m’bezwen-w Senyè,
mache pi pre avèk mwen
Santi m’bezwen-w Senyè, fè-m rive jiskobou
Pandan m’ap fè wout sa , pa kite-m fè-l anven
Kenbe men-m Senyè, ede-m gen la viktwa.

Santi m’vle vwayaje la
Santi m’vle vwayaje la
Limye seles la klere mwen
M santi m vle vwayaje la

titles.ht: SE JEZI KI JWA SALU MWEN

stanzas.text:
Se Jezi ki jwa sali mwen, se Jezi
Se Jezi ki jwa sali mwen, se Jezi
Se li k’te mouri pou mwen
Ki te fè nann mwen vin lib
Se Jezi ki jwa sali mwen, se Jezi.

titles.ht: SE JIS AKOZ DE OU SENYÈ

stanzas.text:
Se jis akoz de ou Senyè
Se jis akoz de ou
Mwen ta fin ale depi byen lontan
Se jis akoz de ou
E si mwen ta viv demen
Se paske-w pran swen mwen
Se pa pa la fòs , ni pa la pwisans
Se jis akoz de ou.

Se ou ki merite louwanj
Se ou ki merite louwanj
Sou montay yo, nan vale yo
Se ou ki merite louwanj.

Se pa lè pou-n dòmi, se lè pou-n leve
Lè pou-n prepare, efase tout fot
Lè pou pèp Bon Dye a amelyore vi yo
Ka Bon Dye ap pare
Pou-l fè yon lòt gran mouv.

titles.ht: SE PA LÒT LA KI PWOBLÈM MWEN

stanzas.text:
Mwen vle fè efò, pou-m kapab avanse
Mwen vle korije, pou-m kapab vini bon
Mwen vle fè efò, pou-m kapab libere
Depi-m fin chanje pap gen obstak ankò.

Se pa lòt la ki pwoblèm mwen
Se mwen menm ki pwoblèm tèt mwen
Lè-m gade nan miwa a
Se mwen ankò mwen wè
Tout tan m’konprann li konsa
L’ap fasil pou-m avanse
Depi-m fin chanje pap gen obstak ankò.

Mwen sou wout la
Mwen pa pè anyen
Zye Bon Dye sou mwen m’pa pè oken danje
Menm si-m te nan nofraj
Mwen toujou asire
Ke Bon Dye pap kite-m mouri avèk mechan.

Se pa plan Bon Dye pou mwen mouri konsa
Gran plan li se pou-m atenn la pèfeksyon
O non se pa posib pou sèvitè Bon Dye
Mouri menm kote avèk mechan.

Lè m’ape mache
Nan l’ombre de la mort
Mwen pa pè anyen paske Jez avè-m
Woulèt ak baton li, la pou rekonfòte-m
Se sa-k ban-m asurans patou kote-m pase.

Lè-m tande gwo loraj
Tanpèt gran van soufle
Mwen menm mwen rete fèm
M’konfye-m nan Letènèl
Mezon ape tonbe pye bwa derasine
Mwen menm mwen refijye-m anba zèl le Senyè.

Menm si yon moun ta fè-w mal
Li kanpe pou-l defann li
Sa pa ba-w dwa pou imilye-l
Konsidere w’se yon viktim
Kelke swa sa yon moun ta fè-w
Fò-w sipòte-l, piga-w venje
Tout sa ou wè, tout sa-w tande, poko jije-l
Lèzòm anba pwisans malen
Si le Senyè fè-w gras
Ou pa fache, ou beni
Ou va wè pèp Bon Dye a
Si le Senyè ede-w, ou ka priye pou li
Lanmou va fè-w sot yon kote
Pou yon lòt kote.

Se pa tout dèt m’te ka peye
Se pa tout fot m’te ka efase
Gen yon bagay m’ta ka eksplike-w
Ou ta jije-m san mizèrikòd
G’on kondisyon m’pat ka chanje
M’te g’on defo m’pat ka elimine
Si pat yon plas ki g’on lotèl
Si pat Jezi nan yon ministè
Kote pou-m pote fado-m yo
Ki pou di-m ale, chanje kondisyon-m yo
Ou konn tout sa pou-w fè.

titles.ht: SE POU SA LOTÈL LA DRESE LA

stanzas.text:
Se pou sa lotèl sa drese la
Nou pap janm bezwen pote fado si lou ankò
Ki gen limyè pou tout tenèb
Yon amou reyèl
Jezi ap tann nou
L’ape tann nou kounye a
Vini avan pòt la fèmen
Se pou sa lotèl drese la.

Lè nou rankontre ak Ministè Bon Dye
Ki ka montre-n eta lavi nou ye
Amou pou enterè se sa-k te domine vi-n
Men yo montre-n ki sa pasyans Bon Dye ye.

Se rezon sa ki fè mwen la
Se pasyans Kris ki fè-m egziste
Si-w wè-m pa ale
Si-w wè-m pa mouri
Se rezon sa ki fè mwen la
Mèsi pou pasyans ou yo.

Nou fè Bon Dye soufri ak natu nou yo
Men-l sipòte-n, ede-n venkè sou peche-n yo
Pasyans, mizèrikòd li fè-n kap toujou jwenn
Amou Bon Dye fè kòlè-l pa manifeste.

Se tout dezi mwen pou-m viv pou Jezi
Se tout dezi mwen pou-m viv pou li
Souvan m’dezobeyi, e mwen vin wont li
Men se tout dezi mwen
Pou-m viv pou li.

Si-w te kab wè kot Jezi te pran-m
E kote m’ye jodia
Ou tap konprann pouki mwen renmen-l konsa
Ou te mèt pran lemond ak tout richès li
M’pa bezwen vi sa
Se tout dezi mwen pou-m viv pou li.

Se tout dezi mwen pou-m ede yon lòt
Youn ki ka gen pwoblèm pou wè wout la
Pou lontan m’te pèdi avan m’te jwenn wout sa
Se tout dezi mwen pou-m viv pou li.

Lè pou bon bagay leve
Fòk g’on semè k’te plante-l
Raje leve pèsònn pa te plante-l
Sa se lespri nou Senyè
Ki chaje avèk fatra
G’on pakèt bann lòt bagay
Ki monte nan lespri nou
Mwen bezw’on semè pou lavi-m
Pou netwaye-m, pou kiltive-m
Sekle lavi-m.

Sekle lavi-m Senyè, sekle lavi-m Senyè
Sekle lavi mwen Senyè
Wete tout sa k’pa bon
Sekle lavi-m Senyè, sekle lavi-m Senyè
Sekle lavi mwen Senyè
Mete tout sa ki bon.

Avan-w wè yon nonm vin jis
Fòk gen levanjil preche
Adam peche nou tout nou eritye
Fòk g’on san ki te koule
Pou peche nou efase
Sa te pran yon nonm kon Kris
Deside bay vi-l pou nou
Nou jwenn yon sovè pou nanm nou
Li restore-n, li afèmi-n, sekle lavi-n.

Jezi se ou menm ki te rele-m
Se rezon sa ki fè-m pa pè
Mwen pa konnen ki jan ou va trete mwen
Si w’ap pran swen-m mwen pa konnen
Si-w pap pran swen-m, se ou-k konnen
Tout sa m’konnen, m’ap ret nan pye-w

Sèl asirans mwen genyen ou te di :
« Menm lè montay yo ta disparèt
Menm lè kolin yo ta sekwe
Menm lè le mond ta boulvèse
Lanmou-m pou nou pap janm fini ».

Jezi se ou menm ki te chwazi-m
Mwen pa genyen pou-m enkyete-m
Mwen pa konnen
Si w’ap ban-m sa-m bezwen yo
Si w’ap geri-m, mwen pa konnen
Si-w pap geri-m, se ou k’ konnen
Tout sa-m konnen m’ap ret nan pye-w.

Senyè ban-m ase mizèrikòd ou jodia
Ban mwen fòs Senyè pou-m fè volonte-w
Met amou-w nan kè mwen
E fè-m santi-m yon pati nan kò a
Ak ou toujou.

Senyè ban-m yon chans
Pou-m kab atenn bi a
Menm si lamò vle vlope mwen
Senyè ban-m yon chans
Jou yo konn vin nwa, mwen vle avanse
Senyè kenbe men mwen ban-m yon chans.

Senyè beni an, sovè dè zòm
Kris woche sali, pi bon zanmi-m
Dirije mwen chak jou nan dwa chemen
E yon jou m’a va vini pwòp
Pou-m kanpe devan w.

Senyè ede-m pou-m fè volonte ou
E pa kite lachè anvlope mwen
Menm si vag yo ta vle monte si wo
Senyè ede-m pou-m fè volonte ou.

Senyè f’on kloti
Tout o tou mwen chake jou
Senyè m’mande-w pou pwoteje mwen
Pandan m’nan chan batay la
Senyè m’konnen ou vle
Senyè m’konnen-w kapab
Goumen pou mwen chake jou
F’on kloti tout o tou mwen chake jou.

Senyè fè mwen genyen yon bon kondwit
Kote-m pase pou-m temwaye nom ou
Fè-m yon limyè
Pou-m klere tout tenèb mond sa
Ede-m pou-m viv chak jou nan prezans ou.

titles.ht: SENYÈ FÈ MWEN SA-M DWE YE

stanzas.text:
Senyè fè mwen sa-m dwe ye
Ede-m pou-m menm jan ak ou
Gide-m monte pi wo pou-m kab wè fas ou
Senyè fè mwen sa-m dwe ye.

Senyè fè-m gen konpasyon pou pwochen-m
Menm jan-w te gen konpasyon pou mwen
Koute lè-m rele-w, kenbe-m pou-m pa tonbe
Nan menm twou kote w’te wete-m nan
Senyè se pa gras mizèrikòd ou
Ki te fè-m jwenn si gran sali sa
Senyè fè-m gen konpasyon pou pwochen-m
Menm jan w’te gen konpasyon pou mwen.

titles.ht: SENYÈ FÈ-M KONPRANN SA W’AP FÈ

stanzas.text:
Senyè fè-m konprann sa w’ap fè nan tan sa
Louvri zye-m pi gran pou-m kab wè
Kòman w’ap aji
Nan mitan detrès mwen yo, la chè vle fè-m tonbe
Akoz esperans ou ban mwen, m’ap rete fèm.

titles.ht: SENYÈ JEZI FÈ NOU TOUT VINI YOUN

stanzas.text:
Senyè Jezi fè nou tout vini youn
Pou yo kab wè nou gen la verite
Ba nou amou menm pou sak pa renmen nou
E fè-n vin youn menm jan ke ou te ye.

titles.ht: SENYE JEZI KITE LESPRI-W NAN MWEN

stanzas.text:
Senyè Jezi, kite lespri-w nan mwen
Pou-m pa pèdi plan ou
Mwen vle wè tèt montay siyon an
Tanpri Senyè fè-m gras
Nanm mwen fatige anpil
Mwen pa kapab pèdi prezans
Tanpri chè Senyè, kite lespri nan mwen.

Sou ki moun pou-m konfye-m
Si se pa sou bon sovè a
Sou ki pou-m apiye-m
Lè eprèv yo vin an fas mwen
Li konn tout afè-m, se li kap gide-m
Pouki sa m’pa konfye mwen
Nan yon sèl sovè a.

Senyè kenbe men mwen
Kenbe men mwen, kenbe men mwen
Senyè kenbe men mwen
Kenbe men mwen, kenbe men mwen
Chemen an glise, e li difisil
Senyè si-w kenbe men mwen
M’konnen mwen va rive.

Sikonsi nan lavi-m
Olye m’panse de linivè
O wi m’toujou kontan
Menm si-m grangou, menm si-m tounu
Li pap ban-m manti, pawòl li yo vrè
Jezi si ou kite mwen, sou ki m’va apiye-m.

Nan Jezi m’jwenn lavi
Lapè, lajwa avèk espwa
Li ban-m ankourajman
Menm si-m di-w sa ou pap konprann
Vin fè menm avè-m
W’a di menm ak mwen
Yon jou w’a temwanye tou
Sa Jezi fè pou ou.

Sa pa di mwen anyen
Si mwen fè yon chanjman de vi
Men Bon Dye pale mwen
M’pa moun isi fòk mwen ale
Yon jou m’va kite vye kò peche sa
M’a chita ak sovè a nan bèl Jerizalèm.

Senyè kenbe men mwen, pou-m rive nan jou sa
Senyè kenbe men mwen
Pou-m rive nan jou pafè a
Wout syèl la pa fasil Senyè fòk mwen ale
Senyè kenbe men mwen
Pou-m rive nan jou pafè a.

Senyè lonje men-w ban mwen pou-m travèse
Senyè lonje men-w ban mwen pou-m travèse
Mwen kanpe devan lamè a
Lame faraon dèyè-m
Senyè lonje men-w ban mwen pou-m travèse.

Senyè m’ap adore-w, e m’ap ba ou glwa
M’ap di ou mèsi
Louwe-w pou tout sa ke w’ap fè
Pou tout sa ke-w te fè pou mwen
Pou verite ke-w te fè-m wè
M’ap adore-w e m’ap louwe-w Wa mwen.

Pou lontan m t’ap chèche gen yon pè ki reyèl
M’ pat janm gen kontantman nan vi mwen
Alò Jezi vini te ban-m yon vi nouvo
Kouny-a dezi-m se pou-m viv pou li.

Senyè m’ap chèche-w
Wi nanm mwen dezire-w
Gad kè-m Senyè jan mwen dezire-w
Plen tas mwen konplètman e renouvle-l chak jou
Men kè-m Senyè, se ou m’dezire.

Gen yon plas nan kè mwen
Mond sa pap satisfè
Sèlman Jezi, volonte pafè-l
Li vinn zanmi-m depi lespri-l nan mwen
Kouny-a dezi-m dezire-l chak jou.

Seyè m’di wi, m’ap di wi
A volonte-w, m’ap di wi
kote-w voye-m, m’va ale
Seyè m’di wi, m’ap di wi.SENYÈ-M DI WI
Seyè m’di wi, m’ap di wi
A volonte-w, m’ap di wi
kote-w voye-m, m’va ale
Seyè m’di wi, m’ap di wi.SENYÈ-M DI WI
Seyè m’di wi, m’ap di wi
A volonte-w, m’ap di wi
kote-w voye-m, m’va ale
Seyè m’di wi, m’ap di wi.

Senyè m’di-w mèsi, ou touche lavi-m
Ou te fè-m wè, de zye-m yo te louvri
Ou met verite-w nan fon kè-m
Pou venk tout peche k’ nan lavi-m
Senyè m’di-w mèsi
Ou touche lavi-m.

Senyè m’grangou e mwen swaf ou
Ban-m manje sou tab ou
Ban mwen la manne ki sot nan syèl
Ban mwen pou bwè
Nan fontèn ki pap jamè seche a
Senyè m’grangou
E mwen swaf ou chak jou.

titles.ht: SENYÈ MEN LAVI MWEN NAN MEN OU

stanzas.text:
Senyè men lavi mwen nan men ou
Senyè men lavi mwen nan men ou
Senyè imilye lespri-m yo
Rebati panse-m yo
Pran lavi-m pou ou sèl.

Senyè montre-m chemen an
Louvri zye-m pou-m kapab wè
Ban-m yon kè ki ka konprann
Mistè-w nan fen tan sa
Ede-m lite jou aprè jou, Senyè.

Men mwen devan-w
M’vle imilye-m sou men pwisant ou
Mwen rekonèt si-m fè volonte-w
Bonte-w pap janm fini pou mwen
Malgre fot mwen yo ak eprèv mwen yo
Ou pa janm kite-m sèl
Men-w fè mwen wè si-m la toujou
Paske-w gen plan pou mwen.

Senyè mwen pwostène devan-w
Ak fado mwen yo
Mwen pa kapab kache ou pwoblèm mwen yo
Menm si m’ta vle kache ou
Tout efò-m yo ta anven
Tout solitid sou vizaj mwen, ou wè yo.

Se gras a ou Senyè ki fè m’ap viv jodia
Ban-m plis krent ou ak sentespri
Ki va ede-m rive yon jou
M’pap enkyete-m pou tout sa kap rive
Sou chemen-w avèk mwen
Si-w ka chwazi-m pou-m sèvi ou
Paske-w gen plan pou mwen.

Senyè mwen vin louwe nom-w
Pou mizèrikòd ou yo
M’ap leve men-m pou-m onore-w
Mèsi pou amou ou.

Senyè padone erè mwen yo
Aryè fon-m petèt ka blan
Men-l gen kèk tach nwa ankò
W’a gade anndan fon kè-m
W’a retire tout sa-k pa bon
Senyè padone erè mwen yo.

titles.ht: SENYÈ-M NAN KAB FÈ TOUT BAGAY

stanzas.text:
Tout bagay wi tout bagay
Tout bagay wi tout bagay
Senyè-m nan kab fè tout bagay
Si-l fè latè ak tout richès li
E tout sa ki ladan-l
Senyè-m nan kapab fè tout bagay.

Si Jezi di m’kapab, m’kapab
Si Jezi di m’kapab, konnen m’kapab
La chè eseye di-m, mwen pa ka fè lepouz
Si Jezi di m’kapab, m’kapab.

Si Kris pat avèk mwen kote m’ta ye
Lè eprèv yo menase vi mwen
Avèk amou-l ki antoure mwen
Met nan kè mwen yon vrè chan pou li.

Kris gen sipriz pou ou frè mwen
Kris gen sipriz pou ou zanmi mwen
Si ou lèse-l dirije lavi ou
Gras li va yon supriz pou ou.

Si dlo nan zye-m ta koule souvan
Si angwas yo ta vegle zye mwen
Si ènnmi an ta ban mwen yon defi
Delivrans mwen se nan gras li.

Senyè ede-m fè mwen rive
Lòt bò mòn nan, se la m’vle ale
Kote ki gen lapè e la jwa
Se la m’va poze nanm mwen.

Si ministè Bon Dye pat avèk mwen
Kote-m ta ye
Li se fòs mwen, yon abri pou-m kache
Li se soutyen-m, l’ap viv pou mwen
Se li menm ki se tout bagay pou mwen.

Si mwen pa louwe-l, l’ap pran yon lòt
Si mwen pa renmem-l, l’ap pran yon lòt
Si mwen pa leve men-m
Pou-m bay Bon Dye louwanj
L’ap met yon lòt nan plas mwen.

Si nou kenbe la fwa nou gen pou nou wè
Sa Bon Dye ka fè
Li te pouse lamè wouj pou pèp izrayèl
Ak la fwa yo tout te pase
E lè-l te di nan pawòl li gerizon
Ak la fwa, yo te kwè sa te fèt
Si nou kenbe la fwa nou gen pou nou wè
Sa Bon Dye ka fè.

Si pou-m mati, mwen mèt mati
Mwen deside pou-m wè Wa sa
Si pou-m mati, mwen mèt mati
Mwen deside pou-m wè Wa sa

Map efòse mwen pou-m al lakay mwen
M’ap efòse mwen pou-m wè Wa sa
M’ap efòse mwen pou-m peye pri a
M’ap efòse mwen pou-m wè Wa sa.

Li kite tout glwa-l nan syèl la
Malgre l’konnen fòk li mouri
Sou yon ti mòn yo te rele golgota
Kote l’te bay lavi-l pou nou.

Si sa pat lamou, lamè a seche
Pa gen zetwal nan syèl la
Zwazo pa ta vole
Si sa pat lamou, syèl pa egziste
Lamou pa egziste
Si sa pa lamou.

Menm nan lamò li te sonje
Brigan sou kwa bò kote-l
Li te pale ak amou e konpasyon
Jodia ou menm ak Wa nan paradi.

Si se pat Jezi ki bò m’ta ye
Si Senyè-m nan pat louvri zye-m yo
Mwen tap flote san bi nan rivyè lavi a
Mwen tap viv sèlman pou mwen.

Si-m gade fidelite-m, e fè efò pou-m rive
Konbyen ere mwen va santi mwen ere
Mwen va renye ak Jezi
« Sur la montagne de Sion »
Konbyen ere mwen va santi-m ere.

Men vwa lepou ape kriye soti pèp mwen
Sot pami yo
Pèp Bon Dye a sove lavi-w
Vini, vini louwe
« Sur la montagne de Sion »
Kote limyè syèl la ape briye.

Bon Dye g’on plan
Pou chak moun ki nan plas sa a
Pa imilye yo
Pa chase yo nan wayom nan
Paske nou chak ki la
Gen yon travay nou ka fè pou li
Pa panse-w pi bon pase yon lòt
Pou w’ap jije-l
Dye tou pwisan konnen kè chak pitit li.

Si-m kab nan plas sa toujou
Se gras ak Senyè-m nan
Si se te pou lèzòm, m’pa tap la ankò
Li pat mouri pou efase peche yon sèl moun
Si-l te mouri pou yon sèl moun
